comments: I may stick with Quidd since the rewards, and drop rates are better. Drop rates for non-teir items should be a lot higher with how few cards of certain sets you get.It should not be so aimed at diamond spending just to try to collect cards that aren't likely to drop. That'll quickly get me not to purchase. Everyone's complaint is about the same, and never addressed. Trade system is great, but players can be greedy. Rewards are too limited. The application is very laggy, and freezes up a lot.

Otherwise a good game, except the ratio of cards in the packs are completely unreal, especially with those events that doesnt give out 15000 coin guaranteed cards, it's very frustrating and maddening when you open up about 50 1:10 packs and do not get any! I noticed that the admins have not responded to this issue brought up by other users. Same issue, getting worse!

I would rate it higher if I didn't have to constantly restart the app. Sometimes collecting prizes sends it into a loading loop. And sometimes collecting cards does it in the work shop. It is so frustrating! Also I wish in the workshop you could just make cards all at once instead of just one at a time. Maybe a pack or just a constant collect. Something especially with how bad it lags

Opening this app is a nightmare. If it manages to load correctly, i get kicked out by error messages telling me that its having trouble pulling up my profile. I would file a conplaint within the app but I cant open anything without it crashing. I genuinely want to play the app, but its been like this since i first started using it and Im tired of it. Excessive loading is one thing, but loading forever only to not do anything and kick me out is too much.

App is so adictive.but there needs to be a easier way to find cards u need should be like a auction area where you can place the cards you want to trade on the list and people can cross-reference with the cards they're looking for I know they say the wish list and supposed to do that but it doesn't this would be easier you would type in the name of the card and see what somebody wants for it and then you could offer it to them I think that would make things easier to obtain certain cards

comments: Lost All My Cards. When I got a new phone and installed the app, I logged in with Facebook as before and my previous user name. All my cards were gone and I was reset back to the beginning. Customer service kept blaming the issue on me and refused to even continue to try to help me sort it out three days ago. VERY DISAPPOINTING!!! I had many cards, not sure I want to take time to rebuild now.

NEW UPDATE: I thought the app couldn't get worse- I was extremely wrong. Limited credit packs got rarer, expecting you to pay real money to get, for stupid designs. Previous Version: WORST APP EVER! Trying to get a limited credit pack - pressed to get it 10+ times for a signature - NONE went through and now I've missed the opportunity TWICE! Hate this App! No Notifications, No Botch Fix! I'm also not getting cards I PAID for. This is feeling like a scam. Previous Version: I'm not getting awards

Is funny to collect card and make trades but almost all the collections has the only option to pay. People are selling cards on ebay because of this. It's crazy. Sometimes it freeze when i want to open a salvation or the trading screen will select random cards when you are scrolling down. There are collections more interesting than others but I like it

The app is wonderful since 2016 I recently decided to reinstall and omg is it fantastic! and active community and a sense of collection and value with each card all contain bac covers and a bunch of information. Beautiful UI as well highly recommended for all star wars fans

I purchased Crystal's so I could grab some of the more rare cards. App crashes, takes my credits, cards and Crystal's. The credits you get for free, I cannot be upset about those. But having the app STEAL something I paid for is wrong. I contacted their help/support with the issue and never heard back. Do yourself a favor, dont ever spend a penny.

title: DLive · Live Stream Community
description:
The mission of DLive is to create a value-sharing live streaming platform that empowers creators and viewers through a revolutionary rewards system.

- Viewer Rewards
Earn by watching streams and engaging with streamers.

- No Platform Cuts From Creators
DLive respects content creators and believes your rewards belong to you, and that's why DLive has zero platform cuts to users.

- Super Friendly Community
Be part of a community that supports each other. The community can take part in ownership of the platform by guiding the direction of DLive's future. Join the the DLive family now.

- Live Notifications
Follow and watch your favorite live streamers. Get notified instantly when your favorite creators go live.

- Hundreds of Games
Explore countless different genres of content including PUBG, Fortnite, and Apex Legends.

DLive is a not just a live streaming platform, it's a community. At DLive, we are changing the whole game by putting platform ownership in the hands of the users through blockchain technology. The users of DLive are the ones that are rewarded for their contributions as the platform grows. Your contributions are always valued. What are you waiting for? Join us today.


Learn more about how DLive works 
https://go.dlive.tv/welcome

Want to stream on DLive? 
https://go.dlive.tv/stream

Learn more about our community 
https://community.dlive.tv

For help and support 
https://help.dlive.tv

comments: Good quality of replays. However, doesn't let me comment using chat. Doesn't let me mobile stream on my tablet. When I try to find my stream ID with my browser, I am redirected back to the app. Huh? OK, now I am allowed to chat but still there is no camera icon beside my avatar. Is there no one in your support area who cares enough to answer this query? Is it my tablet settings? Anybody there? Hello!

Ok, this is quite a nice platform, the mobile app needs a lot of work though, it's very glitchy and I cant figure out how to tweak my channel at all. Edit: Also, it wont let you make a secure password, I should be able to use any symbols in my password, but not with DLive. Edit: I have to remove some stars because #1 Can't just stream my camera. #2 You have to use sketchy stream labs that wants total access to whatever account you are using #3 have to bend over backwards to make it work.

Can't post a comment, I just downloaded your app and while trying to post a comment on live stream, it keeps telling me to verify my email, I've done it multiple times and it still won't work, I uninstalled the app and downloaded it again, still to see if it'll work now

Buggy but still very decent for a free app. Edit: App is alot better now. The bugs i was experiencing with goin fullscreen, are no longer an issue. What was looked at as just an alternative to other streaming platforms is becoming a competitor IMHO. Kudos

It was good, but I can't login for some reason, whenever I try to login with my email, it says authentication error. Also, forgot password doesn't help at all, it says password wasn't made with this account or something.

title: Yalla - Free Voice Chat Rooms
description:
Yalla is the most popular Live Group Voice Talking and Entertaining Community. Voice Chat and play games with people from nearby or all over the world.

Meet new friends is never easier:
Choose group voice rooms from THOUSANDS live rooms daily, filter rooms by Countries or Topics. 50+ Countries has already been covered, while tons of topics are available to choose.

Party with friends with no distances:
Group voice talk with friends no matter where they are, broadcast your favorite musics inside the room, sing karaokes together, and play a range of games directly in group chat. Let's get the party started.

FEATURES:

TOTALLY FREE — Enjoy free live voice chat over 3G, 4G, LTE or Wi-Fi.

PUBLIC CHAT ROOMS — Browse THOUSANDS live chat rooms from NEARBY or AROUND THE WORLD that cover thousands of topics. 

PRIVATE CONVERSATIONS — Start private one-on-one text and voice conversations with your friends from anywhere in the world.

CHAT GAMES — Play games together directly in your chat group!

VIRTUAL GIFTS — Stunning animated gifts can be sent out to express your love.

SHARE and FOLLOW — Share your favorite ROOMS on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Snapchat and more, inviting friends and new followers.

Follow us to get the latest news, updates and events:
Facebook: facebook.com/yalla2016/
Website: www.yalla.live

Dear YALLA users, your feedback and suggestions are welcomed to: yallasupport@yalla.live

comments: This app is still scrolling, will not stay loaded. Tried reboot, log out/log in, and even made sure nothing else on internet signal- nothing is working. We start watching show then it starts threading and won't clear. I have exhausted all technical things to clear, hasn't been successful. Please fix this, you'll end up losing customers if this doesn't get resolved. Oh by the way, I have Netflix, Hulu, and Disney+ for my family, I'm able to view all of these without issue. Thanks for reading!

I love Up Faith & Family !! Good, holsom, Christian movies that pull your heart strings and touch your soul. I love it. Because of the computer's firewall and what not, it does lag at times but I have it on my phone and there is no lag at all when I cast it to the TV. Again, I just love it!!

I love it i just wish that it had a way of allowing multiple people to watch it without it messing with the other persons show like if 2 peaple watch the same show it will show one persons part will show up but not the others so i just wish you could have 2 accounts similar to Netflix
So this app has error messages about a week after paying... still cant play any videos. Guess it's time to give up... its the een at least 2 months, probably longer
We absolutely love your app!! Its hard to find good, clean and wholesome television these days! Bringing Up Bates is our favorite show💖

title: VET Tv
description:
Military humor at your fingertips. Veteran owned and operated, VET Tv recreates and parodies the military experience to deliver absurd, non-PC humor you can’t get anywhere else. We stopped taking ourselves seriously a long time ago and started laughing about the good ole times in the military. Maybe you've asked yourself, "Why does Hollywood always get it wrong? The military doesn't talk or act like that. Give me something real about the military!" We did too. That’s why we created VET Tv, where dark comedy and an authentic military voice finally come together to bring you the funniest TV shows ever made about the military.

What you'll love about VET Tv:
• Original TV shows you can't find anywhere else
• New content released every week
• Every branch of service represented
• Downloadable videos
• Closed Captions / Subtitles

What you'll hate about VET Tv:
• Loss of social life due to a VET Tv addiction
• Hernia from laughing so hard
• Desire to enlist or even re-enlist

Download the app to subscribe* or you can subscribe on the website and log in on the app. Watch however you like to watch stuff - phone, tablet, TV, or your computer at www.veterantv.tv.

*All payments will be paid through your iTunes Account and may be managed under Account Settings after the initial payment. Subscription payments will automatically renew unless deactivated at least 24 hours before the end of the current cycle. Your account will be charged for renewal at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current cycle. If you are broke or want to cancel, just disable auto-renewal.

Privacy Policy: https://www.veterantv.tv/privacy 
Terms of Service: https://www.veterantv.tv/tos

comments: I know you're working on adding more content so I going to not going to hold that against VET Tv just yet however I would suggest only subscribing one month at a time until they actually have more content than you can watch in one month. Other than that it an awesome concept. Their shows are funny, relatable, and have the potential grow and expand enough to not only have a good citcom series run but also have possible spin-offs shows as well.

Some seriously funny stuff if you're a military person! All the shows are amazing! The app itself could be a little more user friendly maybe an auto play feature so that it runs straight into the next app instead of having to look for an episode each time.

Guys I love it! Haha. I haven't found anything I didn't laugh my ass off about. Majority of my friends have served as well as family. Even my 87 year old uncle was laughing at grunts life. Nothing like this has ever been done nor can it ever be done better. Thank all of you for not just what you've endured, what you have sacrificed, what you have overcame but for helping every single person, veteran and civilian, with whatever struggles they have. You're all ace's.

As a civilian this is a great experience for me, and I'm sure as veterans it's an even better experience when you can connect with what they're saying and laugh even harder at what normal civilians consider offensive. To me none of this is offensive and it's a great comedy channel that has no match, it's better than even Comedy Central
Funny stuff. Reminds me of so many situations in the Corps. Spot on with the language, terms and the reality of what happens in Garrison and deployment life when there's "down time".

title: CBS All Access
description:
Stream full episodes of your favorite shows the day after they air for FREE! Plus, unlock more than 10,000 episodes, exclusive original series and live TV, including sporting events like the NFL on CBS, when you subscribe to CBS All Access.

Free CBS app users can: 
• Stream the latest episodes FREE. Catch up on the latest primetime, daytime and late-night episodes in HD. 
• Watch your local CBS station live using your TV provider credentials.

CBS All Access subscribers can: 
• Stream 4 channels of live TV: your local CBS station (including the NFL on CBS), 24/7 news coverage on CBSN, live scores + highlights on CBS Sports HQ and 24/7 entertainment news on ET Live.
• Obsess over originals. Watch subscriber-only original series like The Twilight Zone, Star Trek: Discovery, The Good Fight and Why Women Kill.
• Download and watch offline with a Commercial Free plan. 
• Watch thousands of episodes, live and on demand, like hit series SEAL Team and Survivor.  
• Binge a classic. Catch up on ad-free classic series like the original Twilight Zone, Star Trek, Beverly Hills 90210, I Love Lucy and more.


Try CBS All Access FREE now! After your trial, it’s only $5.99/month for the Limited Commercials plan or $9.99/month for the Commercial Free plan.
(Live TV includes commercials and select shows have promotional interruptions. Downloaded content is accessible for earlier of 30 days from date of download or 48 hours from start of playback. Downloaded content is not playable outside the U.S.) 

Download the app now to get started!


Show and episode availability subject to change. Please note use of the CBS app is limited to United States. All Access promotional offers for new subscribers only. Live TV subject to availability. Prices shown are in U.S. dollars. Other restrictions apply.

Please note: This app features Nielsen’s proprietary measurement software which will allow you to contribute to market research, like Nielsen’s TV Ratings. Please visit http://www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information. 

For additional information about this app’s video services, including your choices, please visit http://legalterms.cbsinteractive.com/video-services.

California Do Not Sell My Info:
https://ca.privacy.cbs/donotsell

California Privacy/Info We Collect:
https://ca.privacy.cbs

comments: Signing up for "CBS All Access" also signed me up for "CBS Full Episodes" without my consent! This results in a double credit card charge every month. Check your credit card statements! Absolutely terrible app anyway, full of alpha-level bugs.

This app works well, for the most part, on my SHIELD TV Pro (recently updated to 8.1.1) and 1080p TV. It works better than the Roku and regular Android versions, perhaps because my SHIELD has a hard-wired Ethernet connection to the router whereas my other devices stream via Wi-Fi. The audio, picture quality, and stability are all good. The only problems I've experienced are out-of-synch audio and video on a few episodes of older shows (specifically Frasier).

I tried watching PICARD but it was impossible to understand. Lots of gaps in the audio and stuttering. Screen freezes and the large pause symbol displays, then the program starts again and the same thing happens over and over. And the background audio is much too loud making it difficult to hear the dialogue. And when there is an action sequence with no dialogue the audio volume goes way up. I have to constantly increase and decrease the volume control. I even had Spectrum come out to check all my connections and signal strength. All in all, this whole thing sucks. And there was no Closed Captioning !!!!!
Ever since the last update there is constant skipping and buffering. It's not worth paying for this low quality video/audio. I'm canceling at the end of the month.

Oof! I subscribed just to see Picard, and it was the absolute worst streaming app experience on my Nvidia Shield. I chose the "limited commercials" option, which is a joke. Not only are there lots of commercials, they hang, rebuffer, loading logo, require a restart, and so on. Worth mentioning that I am on gigabit fiber, and have zero problems with the other major streaming apps. The frustration of messing with this poorly designed app really took away from enjoying the program. Hopefully, it'll show up eventually on some other platform, because I am out.

title: BritBox by BBC & ITV – Great British TV

Created by the BBC & ITV, BritBox brings the biggest collection of streaming British TV right to your fingertips. 

Start your 7-day free trial today – no commitment, cancel anytime.

You’ll get:

-Hundreds of classic comedies, dramas, mysteries, soaps, documentaries, lifestyle and historic broadcasts, ad-free and on demand
-Exclusive new releases, series, and specials, direct from Britain’s premier broadcasters, the BBC and ITV
-Many shows available hours after they air in the UK, like EastEnders and Vera

comments: I haven't seen a lot of these shows, so the content is decent for me. Since there isn't a ton of variety or new content on a regular basis, I'll probably cancel in 1-3 months time. The App itself is terrible. Constantly glitches, does not support Chromecast as it claims, can't use it simultaneously with other apps, and continuously rejects my username and password even though it's right. Overall, disappointed. It could have had a lot of potential

Love the content but considering unsubscribing in search for a more reliable service. As others mentioned, the app just stops working (you get a grey screen or a loading screen) from time to time. This happened on Feb 5th, when it did not work for a day, and today again. I don't use it every day, so it is possible it doesn't work more often than just a few days a month. No response or apologies/refunds from developers. Please fix this.

Having the same problems I have been reading about on here. Won't replay a show if I want to watch again. Now it won't play an episode I haven't watched. Please fix. I have reinstalled and signed out and back in. Thanks. Was working for awhile but as of 11/20 or so it started not letting me rewatch a show or continue on to the next episode of a series I'm watching. Please fix Thanks ps I'm using my Mobile phone. Hello. The app has been great. But has 3/17 it won't load just broken circle.

I like the shows, but... I can't log in to watch them anymore. It says my password is invalid. I changed my password, twice, to try and fix it. Still can't log in. Tried to delete the app and download again. Still can't log in. Tried to turn off my tablet and turn it back on again. Any guesses? Yep, still can't log in.

The app is ok but the service is not. There is no way to rate them separately so I'm going to review the service since it costs money. The service is relatively cheap, currently $7/mo less 2 months if you pay for a year at a time. They do have a lot of the old BBC shows but they fall short on several of the newer shows. For example, I really like the "new" doctor who that started running in 2005 to now. They have NONE of those seasons available. For me this is a deal breaker.

title: JibJab
description:
Put your face in funny GIFs, popular Music Videos, and dancing Ecards for holidays and special occasions including Birthdays, Christmas, Thanksgiving and more!

• Share over text, WhatsApp, Twitter, Facebook and more!
• Save GIFs and videos to your camera roll.
• Add the faces of friends, family or even your pet!
• GIFs and videos updated frequently.

FOR HOLIDAYS
• Thanksgiving
• Christmas
• Hanukkah
• New Years
• Valentine’s Day
• St. Patrick’s Day
• Passover
• Easter
• Mother’s Day
• Father’s Day
• Independence Day
• Halloween

FOR SPECIAL OCCASIONS
• Happy Birthday
• Thank You
• Love
• Anniversary
• Get Well
• Congratulations
• Weddings
• Baby
• Graduation
• and more!

Have feedback or questions? Get in touch with us at help@jibjab.com.

HOW DOES A JIBJAB MEMBERSHIP WORK?
• You’ll find 1,000+ GIFs in the JibJab app that are free to view and share.
• A membership provides access to make and share 1,200+ premium Ecards and Music Videos in the JibJab app and on JibJab.com for only $2.99 per month.
• New GIFs, Ecards, and Music Videos are included in your membership.
• Payment will be charged to your Google Play Account at confirmation of purchase.
• Memberships automatically renew for $2.99 each month unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
• You may manage your auto-renewal by visiting your Google Play Account Settings after purchase.
• For JibJab’s Terms of Sale, see: https://www.jibjab.com/terms-of-sale.

comments: My daughter and I found JibJab ten years ago, and to this day still making memories! There are a number of similar apps available however!, JibJab remains to be the best there is! As for the rest...you snooze, you lose, I'm sorry to say! Super easy to navigate,awesome UI, and most of all great fun, and a good laugh! Thank you for many memorable years JibJab!

It's generally a fun app to use. Songs were shorter than I remembered from years ago. Down side: it takes the last face you've used for the previews of all the videos that you see when you open the app. Some videos, though comical, are also sexual, and it was uncomfortable to see "myself" doing inappropriate things on videos, or worse yet, my kids, or my Mom. Couldn't see way to opt out of having those videos previewed when I opened the app, so I deleted it.
its a cool app. i like it! it's silly and fun especially when you add people and them send it to them. It puts me in a better mood when I'm down or just in a bad mood
Fun app! Easy to set up and use. The free subscription is good but monthly sub is much better because you can get full videos.
So far, excellent. I have a blast with this & it seems the receiving end also has a lot of fun with it too!! What a neat surprise for some people!!!!!

title: Rooster Teeth®
description:
Rooster Teeth is THE place to get a little bit of everything you need. It’s where you go for your daily fix of videos and content, including Red vs. Blue, RWBY, award-winning podcasts, gaming videos, Let's Plays, live action shorts, scripted series, and even movies!

Rooster Teeth channels include:
- Achievement Hunter
- Funhaus
- Kinda Funny
- Inside Gaming
- Cow Chop
- JT Music
- ScrewAttack
- Sugar Pine 7
And more!

The vast majority of our content is free on Rooster Teeth! If you want to get rid of those pesky pre-roll ads, unlock exclusive content, and support the creators you love, you can sign up in-app to become a FIRST member. Your subscription helps us keep making the content YOU want to see and hear. Try your first week free - cancel anytime. Plans start at $5.99/month.

FIRST members enjoy the following benefits:

- Watch everything FIRST
- No pre-roll ads
- Exclusive content
- Live broadcasts
- 5% discount at the RT Store
- Gold star by your profile name


In-App Purchase information:
- When you have confirmed purchasing the subscription, your Account will automatically be charged.
- The subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. You can manage subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal by going to Account Settings after purchase.
- Your Account will be charged $5.99 monthly, $32.99 for every six months, or $59.99 yearly for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.
- The current subscription cannot be canceled during active subscription period.

- You can find our Privacy Policy at https://roosterteeth.com/privacy-policy and Terms of Service at https://roosterteeth.com/terms-and-conditions

comments: I dont have an issue with this app. It's nice and the shows are funny, however there's a slight issue with the function ability of the video its self. I dont know if it's just me or my wifi, but the video will stop and tell me that there was a problem. Usually I have to go uninstall it and re install it, please fix this.

The content is golden, the app is lead. When I'm casting, I might as well wait a week and just do it from YouTube because the quality would be better. The fact that I also have to skip forward or backwards by 30 seconds as opposed to YouTube's 10 seconds is a very odd choice. Also, Low/Medium/High for video quality means nothing if there is not a number attached. Needs work.

I just downloaded the entire series of Red Vs Blue to watch while at work (also to avoid using mobile data) and NONE of the videos are playing. At all. I press play and after 5 seconds it says "Something went wrong. Try again". All of the videos were downloaded (over wifi) onto my phone's SD card. I have numerous shows downloaded from Netflix and they play perfectly fine, no buffering or data connection needed. So what is the issue here?!? Soo frustrating.

Couldn't upgrade cause screen bug. Wanted to watch haunter and the screen for the upgrade is small and cuts off the I've read and agree button so I can't click it. If it gets fixed I'll give it an actual rating. The 1 star is because I just can't use it on android tablet at the moment.
I love the things rooster teeth do, but until they fix the video errors with random stops that force you to restart the app at least once along with loading issues. It's 4 stars from me.

title: Hallmark Movies Now
description:
Hallmark Movies Now includes hundreds of hours of engaging, commercial-free content full of meaningful moments, laughter, and heart. Watch original movies, series, and exclusive content, from Hallmark Channel, Hallmark Movies & Mysteries, and Hallmark Hall of Fame. Plus, a selection of heartfelt Hollywood favorites. All commercial-free for as low as $4.99/month—that’s two months free with an annual subscription.

It’s easy to get started! Download today to start your FREE TRIAL and watch instantly!
• Your favorite Hallmark Channel original movies, series and specials
• Captivating whodunnits from Hallmark Movies & Mysteries
• The library of Hallmark Hall of Fame movies
• Handpicked Hollywood favorites, including movies and series with emotionally rich storytelling and engaging characters

Features include:
• Feel good movies & shows
• Exclusive content you can’t see anywhere else
• 100% commercial-free content
• New titles added all the time
• Watch anytime & anywhere

Choose a Hallmark Movies Now subscription that’s right for you:

comments: *edit to add* read the responses to other complaints. It is a cookie cutter response that doesn't have anything to do with the issues. DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME OR MONEY ON THIS APP!! My card just got charged and I can't even get into the app to watch anything. It keeps telling me network difficulties. I don't even know how I can get a refund and cancel my subscription. I am not going to pay for something I can't watch. Charged me after I asked them to cancel.

Very poor service. I am having continuous problems. It keeps telling me I have too many devices logged in and I am only using it on 1 tv. It makes no sense. I have edited this review on 3/20/20. They did not help me at all by email. I emailed them at the time I started having problems and I replied with the information they requested. The only way I got the problem solved was by actually calling the help line. You will be on hold for awhile but since I called I have not had anymore problems!

This app is great when it works. I'm paying for a subscription and I can't even watch anything. Everytime I log in and then go to play a movie it logs me out and takes me back to the login screen. I've tried force stop and restart, uninstall and restart and it still does it. Please help. I'm very frustrated.

The movies and shows are the expected fare, though there are a couple of titles that are older Pixl shows I'm surprised not to find here. My biggest issue is that the app randomly kicks me off without warning and asks me to sign in all over again. A secondary issue is that app itself is a little clunky.

This app stops working constantly! I'll come back in to finish a movie and it will be "unavailable at this time". 3/11 still not working properly, crashes a lot. I even try uninstalling the app and reinstalling it and then it tells me I have too many devices. I haven't added devices, I'm just trying to get the app to work. This is especially disappointing when you pay $70+ a year for an app to work and it doesn't.

title: Yarn - Chat Fiction
description:
Yarn - Text Stories

Ever wanted to snoop through people’s conversations and not feel guilty for it? Want to enter a world of suspense and horror but not up for a long read?  Well now you can!

Every Yarn story is told as a short text message conversations, as if you were watching someone else's text messages. Whether it be hypothetical conversations between two of your favorite celebs, a frantic group chat after accidentally liking an ex’s photo on Instagram, or those suspenseful mysteries you just can’t get enough of… Yarn lets you tap through it all!

It’s about time to make reading fun, fast, and fabulous again. Stay up to date with your favorite Yarn stories as we update episodes and conversations daily!

Subscribe for unlimited access to all the best Yarn stories.

By using Yarn, you agree to our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy: https://mammoth.la/privacy

If you download this app your not going to be having a good time unless you spend $69.00 plus tax.

Worst app ever first of all the app picks a story for you. After it picks that story for you you can't look at the pictures, go to the next chapter, or read a different one. title: UMC
description:
From visionary Robert L. Johnson, founder of BET, UMC - Urban Movie Channel is your go-to streaming network for the best in African-American and urban entertainment. Watch movies, stand-up comedy, documentaries, original series, exclusive content and more! Featuring stars you love to see, stories you need to know, and hidden gems you'll be thrilled to discover, it's all on UMC. Stream your entertainment, your way - anytime, anyplace, anyhow!
 
Start your 7-Day FREE trial for unlimited, commercial-free access to the entire UMC library.
 
After your free trial ends, your UMC subscription will automatically renew at $6.99 each month, billed through your Google Play account. Cancel at any time by turning off auto-renew in your Google Play account settings.
 
How do I watch?
 
1. Download the UMC app.
2. Register via the app, or go to www.UMC.tv to register and then log in with those credentials.
3. Stream unlimited movies, series, stand-up specials and more.
 
For assistance, please go to Customer Support in the app, or email: support@urbanmoviechannel.com
 
Stay in the know! Head to www.UMC.tv to sign up for the monthly UMC newsletter and stay up to date on the latest premieres, exclusives, promotions and more!

title: WWE SLAM: Card Trader
description:
WWE DIGITAL COLLECTIBLE SHOWCASE!
• New cards released every day in your very own virtual hobby shop!
• Collect Inserts and Signature Cards highlighting top matches and rivalries.
• Collect cards from different eras of WWE. From Attitude Era Stars like Stone Cold and The Rock, to present-day Superstars like The Miz, Ronda Rousey, and Braun Strowman!

FRESH AND ENGAGING CONTENT!
• NEW content for every WWE PPV and NXT TakeOver! 
• Level up by completing sets, earning awards, and pulling cards from packs 
• Dynamic card releases: new series and editions, custom artwork, digital signatures, relics, and more!
• Exclusive WWE Content: collect inserts featuring WWE Comic Covers from BOOM! Studios, or stunning artwork from Rob Schamberger!

BECOME PART OF WWE SLAM NATION!
• Talk, trade, and share your voice with the collecting community.
• Join the best community of WWE card collectors in the world!
• Chat with app users in our fan feed and propose trades 24/7!

*For the best experience, we recommend devices be updated to Android 8.0.0 (Oreo) or later. *

MORE INFO 
Stay tuned with all of the action and newest card releases!
- Follow @ToppsDigitalOfficial on Instagram
- Join on Facebook: facebook.com/toppswweslam/
- Follow @ToppsSlam on Twitter
- https://www.youtube.com/c/ToppsDigitalApps

• Collect Inserts and Signature Cards highlighting top matches and rivalries.
• Collect cards from different eras of WWE. From Attitude Era Stars like Stone Cold and The Rock, to present-day Superstars like The Miz, Ronda Rousey, and Braun Strowman!

FRESH AND ENGAGING CONTENT!
• NEW content for every WWE PPV and NXT TakeOver!
• Level up by completing sets, earning awards, and pulling cards from packs
• Dynamic card releases: new series and editions, custom artwork, digital signatures, relics, and more!
• Exclusive WWE Content: collect inserts featuring WWE Comic Covers from BOOM! Studios, or stunning artwork from Rob Schamberger!

BECOME PART OF WWE SLAM NATION!
• Talk, trade, and share your voice with the collecting community.
• Join the best community of WWE card collectors in the world!
• Chat with app users in our fan feed and propose trades 24/7!

*For the best experience, we recommend devices be updated to Android 8.0.0 (Oreo) or later. *

MORE INFO
Stay tuned with all of the action and newest card releases!
- Follow @ToppsDigitalOfficial on Instagram
- Join on Facebook: facebook.com/toppswweslam/
- Follow @ToppsSlam on Twitter
- https://www.youtube.com/c/ToppsDigitalApps
summary: Officially licensed card trader of WWE® World Wrestling Entertainment, Inc.
developerAddress:
1 Whitehall Street
New York, NY 10004
recentChanges: NEW SLAM '19 Base Set and Card Wheel cards + bug fixes, performance, and app stability improvements.
comments: I used to like this game a good bit until I really got into it. Now I realize how money based this game is. I can save coins and use them to open a featured pack. However I barley get anything, espicially compared to people who buy diamonds. I always thought it was a good game and wondered why I kept seeing the same people in chat. They have all been there since day one. Well now I know they spend hundreds of dollars on packs to open and I am using the coins I have saved. Don't pay Don't go far

So far, I'm sitting at a 3 star rating. The interface and animation are well executed. The aesthetic of the cards are good as well. While microtransactions can be a negative, that's just the state of games these days so the app is par the course on that front. My initial gripe, however, is that I immediately watched 5 videos with promise of 250 coins upon completion and didn't receive them. This is a prominent feature of f2p and while I'd like to continue, I need a way to acquire resources.

I've been supporting this app on and off since the first day it came out years ago. As many people will say, it was very good in the beginning years. When they introduced diamonds, you started to tell who is paying for the cards and who actually is trying to collect them and obtain the rare cards through trades. Putting aside the microtransactions, my only major gripe is that it constantly crashes on older devices (ex: Amazon Fire Tablet) whenever you try to purchase a pack.

I like this game but I wish they would update when you sign in instead of saying 19 it supposed to be 20 and also to be able to get some good cards instead of having to pay cash to buy diamonds wish I would give it some the good ones to people who can't afford to buy diamonds that's why I didn't give it a five star rating is there some things that it could improve on

I would have given this app 5 stars. It is very addicting and the community is very helpful. But it's not fair for people who don't spend money. When new promos come out the people who don't spend money have a slim chance at getting good cards to trade and better there collection. I believe you could definately make this app better if you helped the non money spenders to get better cards than just base cards.

title: Recolor: Adult Coloring Book - Color and Relax
description:
🎨 Color your stress away and become a member of the happiest coloring book community in the world! Join millions of people in the most relaxing coloring book experience available on the Google Play store! 
    
Color over 4000 unique adult coloring pages like mandalas, flowers, dogs and cats, created by our professional artists or upload and bring your own pictures and drawings to life!

Create your own masterpiece or get inspiration and browse through thousands of beautiful coloring pages in our gallery created by our awesome Recolor community!

Relieve your stress and unleash your creativity with Recolor’s stunning coloring pages – it’s fun, easy and only a click away! You can enjoy the FREE version or subscribe to get access to all the amazing premium features.

FEATURES:

🎨 4000+ unique and professional coloring pages (and more every day!) from dozens of categories including: mandalas, cats, dogs, hair, portraits, fantasy, animals, romance, florals, fashion, Barbie, famous movies, and many more.

🎨 The largest coloring community with millions of members to share and view drawings from all around the world

🎨 Import your own photos and drawings, color them and share with your friends

🎨 Hundreds of available colors

🎨 3 FREE new coloring images every day!

🎨 Over 70 palettes and dozens of coloring options to choose from – solid and live colors, gradients, and crayons. You can also create your very own palettes!

🎨 More than 80 stunning effects, filters and outlines to finalize and personalize your art

🎨 Join fun and challenging events and color images to get featured in our app!

🎨 Share your masterpiece with friends on your favorite social networks

Recolor Unlimited Subscription

-    Unlimited access to all Recolor features including the entire gallery of 4000+ pictures, all color palettes, hundreds of colors, cool filters & effects, and a completely ad-free experience for the duration of the subscription. You can choose yourself which subscription suits you best and can manage your settings via your Google Play account/iTunes account.

-    You may cancel a subscription or free-trial anytime via the subscription setting through your iTunes account. This must be done 24 hours before the end of the free-trial or subscription period to avoid being charged.

-    Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period. Any unused portion of a free-trial period, will be forfeited when the user purchases a Recolor Unlimited subscription.

Terms of use: http://recolor.com/terms
Privacy policy: https://recolor.com/privacy

recentChanges:
This update brings the brand new Aurora palette to Recolor users, just in time for our Venetian Carnivale Event! We can’t wait to see how you use them!

comments: I really enjoy recolor and it's the best app I've used, the only down fall is the cost now to use all the colors and pictures.. I can't afford to subscribe at almost $15.00 a month and I would love to be able to enjoy the whole app.. It would be great to take our minds off this event and all the craziness going on, but yes it's a great app if you like coloring and there are some real artists on here...🤗🎨

This game is definitly amazing, I would recomend trying it! My only dislike about Recolor is that, you have to be premium to do a lot of things, you have to be premium for certain pictures, types of effects, and colors. It would be better if yoy brought down the lack of premium things! Other than that, Recolor is a perfect app for when you are bored, and when you dont really feel like doing anything XD. Recolor is a must download.

Love love love Recolor. My mother has been using for years and got me hooked around summer 2019. The pictures are beautiful the colors are vivid the tools easy to use. And thats not all, the community of artist is amazing, everyone supporting each other no matter the skill level. Anyone can enjoy this app. I love the flexiablity of starting and stopping my art project anytime, without the worry of clean up. But all this does come with a price, extra colors cost and the app crashes now and again.

The pictures are really amazing and the coloring itself is really satisfying! Unfortunately in order to color the free pictures you have to watch an ad? I understand as a business you need to get money but when it starts to become your entire app something needs to change. I appreciate the app itself good job on that! I honestly wouldn't mind a couple ads but all of the free pictures having ads? Anyway thank yall for responding to other user's comments! I'm definitley open to corrections!

Love this app but recently it's started deleting my progress. Normally I'll color a little on a piece and step away for a while, closing the app out to save battery, then come back later to finish my work. But now, sometimes, when I open a half-colored picture back up, it's suddenly blank, as if I've done nothing to it. So that's not cool, as well as the allowance of images clearly not colored in the app by some users, but other than that I like it. Great variety of pictures.

title: Face Truth - Future Face Seer & Face Swap
description:
Do you want to see your aging face after 30 years? 
Wondering what your face would look like if you were a foreigner?
Try Face Truth App.

【Face Aging】
Take a selfie, then we can let you see your old face after 30 years with the AI technology in seconds. You can even try your family or friends’s photos to see what they look like when they get old.

【Exotic Face】
Would you wonder what you look like If you were a foreigner? We have a lot of funny effects here. Just upload a selfie then you can see yourself in a variety of exotic styles. it is very interesting.

【Face Status】
Do you know that a person's face shows his own physical state, and also hides his personality, fortune and other information. Scan your face, and we will use big data analysis technology to analyze your physical status, personality, and fortune. Try it and you will know more about yourself.

Come on and download it, you will be shocked by the amazing effects.

Terms of Use:
https://sites.google.com/view/facetruth/terms-of-service

https://sites.google.com/view/facetruth/privacy-policy

comments: Hard to fault really, but one should be able to input the advance date, change hair styles and colour and yellow the teeth a bit!! It does seem to prove a theory of mine that plain faces age less than handsome or very pretty ones! Anyway, loved seeing myself on my 80th birthday, not as bad as I had expected! As I say, good, simple, uncomplicated fun. Great job, thanks!

I have used this app for my Kindergarten class for two years now, in celebration of the 100th day of school. We print their pictures and then the kids write about what it will be like to be 100. They absolutely love it and it's so easy to use!!
Very entertaining. Face Truth is a awesome it tells you how you will look when you are older and it is funny sometimes. This app was sooo funny, love it!

These apps are meant to scam you. It first makes you do a free trial which will later charge you $90. And thr quality is just a pre made picture with dimensions changing. This is a 0 Effort Fraud application meant to scam you.
Shows women face results on all the 3 Male face that I tried (all are in their late 20s). Images after getting old are a joke. Same template for everything.

title: Paint By Number - Free Coloring Book & Puzzle Game
description:
Brighten days with Paint By Number!🥰

Paint By Number is an art drawing game to color modern artworks with coloring by numbers. A number coloring book and coloring puzzle game for everyone, there are so many free and fascinating coloring pages in this coloring book and new pictures for painting by numbers will be updated every day!🎨 Dozens of number coloring categories for choosing, such as animals, love, jigsaw, quotes, characters, florals, mandalas and so on. In addition to ordinary coloring pages of solid color, amazing special coloring pages of gradient color and wonderful wallpaper pictures are waiting for being colored by numbers in here.😆 Share masterpieces with friends and families, enjoy coloring by numbers and beautiful artworks together!

All pictures are marked by numbers, just choose one image follow your heart,💗 and tap the corresponding coloring cells according to the coloring numbers of the palette, it's easy to finish an artwork and bring pictures to life in a short time by coloring by numbers.👩‍🎨 Coloring has never been easier, try it now and draw fantastic coloring pages with painting by numbers!

Key Features
- Convenient and fast: paint by numbers anywhere with no pencil or paper needed.🌊
- Various unique images and new coloring pages update everyday!🍁
- Great variety of themed categories: cute animals, characters, beautiful flowers, stunning places and many more different themes.🏝️
- Easy to color: enjoy the simplicity and ease of painting by numbers and app use, use hints to find tiny hard-to-find cells.🌈
- Quick sharing: post number coloring artworks on all social networks and share with friends and families.✨

Here comes what sort of information is requested by our app and how the permissions are being used.

To ensure that you can save and share artworks successfully, we need you allow Paint By Number to access photos, media and files on your device, and this permission includes reading and writing the contents of your storage. Only with these app permissions can the function of saving and sharing work well.

We only request the absolute minimum number of permissions that it needs to support core functionality, so never mind. You can see more details of app permissions in App info of Google Play. Thanks for your understanding and we’ll try to bring you a better coloring experience!

Contact us: paint_support@dailyinnovation.biz
Follow our page: https://www.facebook.com/PaintByNumber.coloringbook/

comments: I've just started and have completed my first two pictures. The art work is excellent. The colouring in is helped by the number you are working being highlighted in the picture. It also shows if you have finished all the spaces needing that colour with a circle completing itself around that number. My kids love it too. You can also enlarge to help get the tiny areas. Definitely recommend it to everyone.

I really enjoy this game lots and lots because I like art and this game is really something that gives you another point of art instead of just going and have to go into the store and buy paper and colors and all of that you can just sit here get your iPad or your computer or your phone out and just tap on these little color item things to color and is really fun and nice enjoyable and when you get done with all of them you can go back and look at them and say oh my gosh I have did all

I absolutely love this game, but it keeps glitching on me. I have almost 2,000 pictures colored (I've had the game for a while) and almost all of the things completed that give free hints. Then the game will glitch and it won't load the pictures that I've colored and it completely erases all of the things I completed so that I have to start them all over. I delete and redownload the game and everything will work fine for a few days then glitch again and I have to delete/redownload all over again

Much improved and now very enjoyable. Suggestion: water mark on images needs to be smaller or eliminated. 6.27.2017 update This is the best "paint by number' app I've use. Developer is constantly adding new content. Highly Recommend! I'm not associated with the developer and my opinion is my own. 03/20/2020 Use this app everyday. The developers continue to improve and add new picts. FB links give you option of obtaining new content. Developer ask for input from users and make changes, addition.

I do like the pictures, it would be a really really good app if it weren't for all the ads. I hate how you have to watch a ad before and after a picture, I do like that most of them are skippable. My app also has a glitch, when I finish a color it doesn't highlight the new color. Normally it fixes itself quickly but sometimes I have to find the color before it will highlight itself.

title: Sandbox Pixel Coloring
description:
Welcome to the Sandbox Coloring Universe and be ready to become a lover of the coloring of tiny pixel art.

Four facts about Sandbox:
    - Children feel how light, sweet and funny Sandbox is and that it's made just for them. It's like cartoons, but they can participate in the performance, not only to watch.
    - Parents know it's a great way for the whole family to spend time together. No Ads. Only safe art.
    - Specialists know Sandbox is a great opportunity to work on your children's or parents' drawing and motor skills.
    - Teachers know Sandbox is a great way to teach their kids or students basic number recognition and how to use a legend.

Features available for all:
    - Search whatever you want, fruit, lips, gadgets, cats or maybe easy art. Handy search feature filters all content for you.
    - Magic Round Button helps you to find similar art. Just try it and you'll love it.
    - Collections give you an opportunity to organise all your art in the app.
    - Free Drawing Mode lets you practise drawing pixel art. The best art will be featured.
    - Turning your photos from the gallery into pixel art. No words needed.
    - Hints highlight the most interesting art especially for you. 

Best regards, Sandbox Team [with love]

comments: Pretty fun and good for passing time. Would like to see more frequent new pictures but nothing to take me off enjoying it. This is by far the best pixel colouring app I've seen and I don't think any will beat it. Maybe there could be something to help people that aren't good at creating pixel art get better that'd be cool.

It is super sad that you cannot move the colours one by one... Used to be able to and then it was changed and it is super restricting. If colours 5 and 6 are next to each other in the picture you cannot use them both without first adjusting. I like the game but hate it when freedom to colour is restricted.

I like the Sandbox x alot.ecan you put in more patterns ?Please ???The game makes the phone jump around. It's supposed to jump to where the major parts of the number that you are using is located.But it just keeps jumping around.it has also been freezing up.Alot

I love this app because whenever I get bored during class or something I can sit on it and girl well color the desert little area where you can color whatever you want and you can take pictures off of your gallery and color them that's pretty cool too

Good actual colouring. I like that you can have your drawings as live wallpaper and just double tap to fill if you don't feel like colouring it all in (but it doesn't look very good on the animation of colouring it in). However, most of the images are Sandbox Unlimited, which means you pay a subscription for them. No ads, which is good, but I would prefer some ads, more free images and a one-time payment than loads of Unlimited images and a subscription fee. There are better colouring apps.

title: AMC: Stream TV Shows, Full Episodes & Watch Movies
description:
AMC is home to some of the most popular and acclaimed programs on television. Sign in with your TV provider and stay current with the latest full episodes and video extras from your favorite AMC Original Series. Use your phone or tablet to Chromecast directly to your television.

Original AMC programming includes The Walking Dead — the highest-rated series in cable history, Fear the Walking Dead, Preacher, Better Call Saul, Dietland, Humans, Into the Badlands, McMafia, The Terror and many more.

Cable Providers include AT&T U-Verse, COX, DIRECTV, DISH, Optimum, Xfinity and Verizon FiOS, among many others.
 
AMC Premiere subscribers can enjoy current seasons of AMC shows - Ad-Free, On Demand, and available in app at the same time as live broadcast television availability. AMC Premiere subscribers also get early access or full-season access to select shows before they air, plus special content like exclusive extended episodes, bonus scenes, sneak peeks, uncut movies, and more. In-season full episodes are also available to download for offline viewing on your iPhone or iPad for AMC Premiere subscribers.
 
An upgrade to AMC Premiere is only $4.99 a month (TV provider subscription required). Payment will be charged to your Google Play Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Subscriptions may be managed in the settings of your Googley Play Account.
 
To view the full list of TV providers and additional Frequently Asked Questions for the AMC app, go to: https://www.amc.com/android/faq
 
For full information about AMC Premiere, including what content is Ad Free, go to http://www.amcpremiere.com/guide

This app features Nielsen proprietary measurement software which will allow you to contribute to market research, like Nielsen’s TV Ratings. To learn more about our digital measurement products and your choices in regard to them, please visit http://www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information.

Currently, AMC's full episodes are available in the United States and U.S. territories including American Samoa, Guam, Northern Mariana Islands, Puerto Rico, US Military, United States Minor Outlying Islands and US Virgin Islands. AMC episodes and AMC Live are not available to watch in Canada and all other non-US territories.

Privacy Policy: https://www.amc.com/privacy-premiere
 
Terms of Use: https://www.amc.com/terms-premiere

comments: Absolutely terrible. Has great difficulty with casting, "resume" play randomly doesn't work which means when you try to find your place every fast forward triggers a two minute commercial break (of the same 2 commercials on repeat), only to have the app randomly start playing a different show or the spoiler filled recap of the episode on trying to watch. I pay for AMC, but piracy is the only way I can actually watch the shows.

Constantly logs out and the UI is insufferable. I tried using this app but it's absolutely horrid. The interface doesn't allow you to save any show you're watching or has an easy to use library. After I find the show I want to watch it logs me out if the app I've paid for after every episode. The app on the Xbox suffers from the same UI but so far hasn't logged me out.

Crashes constantly. always has issues casting. Seems the only thing that keeps a solid connection is the commercials that will loop over and over and over again while the shows disconnect and freeze. Sometimes the show doesn't load at all and commercials will continue to play... I hope they can fix this app because it's a joke

App is complete trash. Never stays signed in. Plays tons of ads even though you pay. Always says playback error check connection. I have 200mbps internet. The connection isn't the problem. Can't watch anything on mobile data, just buffers . Also the UI for the app is terrible. I need Google maps just to navigate it. AMC makes good TV shows. They don't know how to make an app. Tubi and Crackle are better and more stable as far as the apps concerned and they are free .

This has to be one of the worst TV apps. I skip a few minutes to get back where I was when the app randomly decides to bring be back to the 2 min mark. Then I have to watch like 3 sets of 2 min ads and hope it decides to work. Also the UI sucks.

title: DROPOUT by CollegeHumor
description:
On DROPOUT, stream exclusive shows, watch every new CollegeHumor, Dorkly and Drawfee video first, and binge the library of classic sketches.

WHAT’S ON IT?
-New original series like Dimension 20, Total Forgiveness, and What The F 101, along with the return of CH classics like Precious Plum and Jake and Amir, bigger and better than ever.
-Expanded, weekly versions of CH fan favorites like Um Actually, Cartoon Hell from the Drawfee crew, and new series straight from the brains of our cast members including Brennan Lee Mulligan, Katie Marovitch and Mike Trapp.
-Watch CollegeHumor, Dorkly and Drawfee videos and podcasts a week before they hit YouTube!
-The definitive way to browse our extensive library of the CH video content you know and love.
-Chat with the creators and other fans in the subscriber-only Discord

But hey, big blocks of text are pretty boring. Instead, how about just trying DROPOUT for a week totally free? Download the app and sign up for a trial of 7 free-as-heck days to watch everything your eyes can handle. Cancel anytime in the 7 day trial and never be charge!

Don’t like it? I mean, we’re deeply hurt, but we understand. Cancel your membership, throw your phone in a lake, however you cope with disappointment. DO like it? Just kick back and keep watching, and your first month will automatically begin at the end of the free trial. Semi-annual and annual plans are also available at a discount, if you’re a money whiz. So go ahead and give it a try!

This text isn’t gonna get any more interesting. I mean, I think we’ve pretty much covered all the good stuff. Still here? Um, ok. How’s everything? Good? Cool, cool. What are you looking for? The app description is over. For real. We’re not gonna say any more stuff. Check out the free trial. It’s way better than hanging out in the Play Store this long.

Wow, you’re dedicated. Do you just love app descriptions? Weird. OK, we’re gonna go. Bye.

Terms of Service: https://www.dropout.tv/tos
Privacy Policy: https://www.dropout.tv/privacy

comments: I purchased this within the first few weeks of launch. Initially I was a Dimension 20 fan and wanted the episodes as it came out. But I found myself quickly immersed in the many shows, skits and funny content offered. For the price it's a banger of a value. I'd definitely recommend getting on board. Not just for the great content but to help this company continue to make amazing things and push the boundaries of what they can offer.

I've been subscribed to Dropout since its release, and I haven't been disappointed with the content at all! I'm especially a fan of Dimension 20 and Game Changer, and I loved Total Forgiveness! The only thing I could think to improve would be the closed captions. I mostly watch with the Roku app (not sure how it's different from this version) and the captions are often wrong to the point where someone with no hearing might not be able to follow along.

Love the content. Well worth the subscription price. The app could do with a few features. I would love to be able to download content both as audio (for podcasts) and video for access during travel and would like an autoplay function. hopefully these are coming soon! Edit: star rating updated with new version. Literally no complaints and my favorite streaming service.

The app works very poorly. It remembers where you left off, but won't actually start you there, so you have to remember yourself. It also has no Bluetooth compatability, meaning that you can't pause or play from your headphones. For a video-streaming app, it doesn't do a lot of the things you would hope for.

Somewhat surprisingly worth the money. Almost all of the new content is fantastic, and clearly they're putting the money in creative directions. Curated lists through the back catalog are helpful for getting to hidden gems that have accumulated over the years. UI was buggy at first, but improvements were made over time and now it's functional and pleasant to use.

title: BroadwayHD
description:
This app allows BroadwayHD® subscribers to watch content on Android devices.  A BroadwayHD subscription or individual rental is required for full-length shows.

BroadwayHD® is an online streaming service on a mission to promote and preserve live theatre, extending the reach of Broadway and Broadway caliber shows to anyone, anywhere. Founded by Broadway producers Stewart F. Lane and Bonnie Comley, BroadwayHD is capturing and then transporting the magic of performance from the stage to your screen.  With titles from Broadway, Off-Broadway, London's West End, and professional touring productions, this app has something for every theatre lover.  BroadwayHD's subscription library includes both classics and newly produced, exclusive theatre content that you won't see anywhere else.  BroadwayHD® is Broadway -- Your Way!

BroadwayHD subscriptions purchased with  an in-app purchase are valid for either one month or one year.  Both kinds of subscriptions automatically renew at the end of the period unless you turn off automatic renewals in Google Play Store or on your device.  Renewals are processed approximately 24 hours before the expiration of the subscription period.  You can also choose to rent some shows individually for 48 hours.  For both subscriptions and individual show rentals, payment will be charged to your Google Play Store account once you confirm the purchase.

comments: Downloaded the app to stream content to my smart TV. However, I can't even log in... Always get "Something went wrong. Try again." or "Cannot connect to server. Check your internet connection." That's funny. None of my other streaming services have issues. And I get the same error when I'm on LTE and WiFi. Will definitely be canceling after the free trial. I don't want to watch all of these on just my laptop and it's not worth the Hassel of constantly hooking my laptop up to my TV.

What is going on? This is such a poorly rated app for offering something so amazing...I am so disappointed, especially at a critical time where it is being advertised to be used at home when people cannot go out. I am not able connect to my Chromecast from my Android device through the app. Really huge let down, maybe you should stop advertising your service if it's been an ongoing issue. Really big let down.

DOES NOT WORK!!! I downloaded the app last night, it worked fine, great even. Although I wish I could put transfer it to my tv. Anyways, I tried finishing Cats and it keeps kicking me off, stating connecting error. I am on a 4G network...I am using my data. I have tried switching to my home wifi, still states the same thing 😞 Disappointed!

Don't waste your time with a subscription unless you watch on your internet device. The mobile app has no native Chromecasting. Google chrome on a laptop with the casting addin, the video was poor quality and stuttered constantly, completely unwatchable. Other items watched via browser on TV are flawless. I didn't even bother to check and see if the internet devices displayed decent images and playback, I want to cast to my TV.

Everytime I try to log into my account it says "something went wrong" yet it works perfectly fine on my computer. Also I am unable to watch BroadwayHd on my tv through internet service. I Google and go on broadwayhd website and it says platform doesnt support it when I try and watch. So in conclusion app wont let me log in and my firestick doesnt support this

Color by Number For Adults is an amazing application for adults and kids color by number pictures. Coloring by numbers for adults, this is a relaxing app for relieving stress in everyday life. This is the most relaxing, exciting and fun way to spend your free time.

Color by Number For Adults - large collection of the best coloring by numbers. In all pictures you will able to see numbers, each with a corresponding color. Paint the picture by numbers from the palette and create a colorful and incredible picture, which you can share with friends.

comments: This is one of the better coloring apps I've tried, and I've tried many apps. I would give it 5 stars if more free pics were available to color. Thanks! The following question is totally unrelated to my review of this app: I was wondering if anyone knows "What's Up" with the "Tell us more (Optional)" questions after the review? They should be taken down... they're ridiculous, they don't make no sense, and are very annoying!

I bought a premium membership, and the app advertises other types of coloring page collections that are only available with a paid subscription; however, when I tried to access these collections, I was promoted to pay ANOTHER lifetime subscription or monthly fee. Seriously?!! Aside from that, the coloring pages I can access are beautiful and edgy! So far, I enjoy the relaxation of coloring while listening to meditative music.

Love the pictures and the colors. The colors aren't just flat colors there's shading and patterns involved. I love how cheap the monthly premium is and the lifetime one is a great deal as well. The only reason I gave it 4 stars (really I'd give it 4.5) and not 5 is that you still have to pay to unlock story missions (though at a discount) even though you have a premium membership.

Generally liked the game at first, liked the comicbook-like feature (which I had not seen in any other coloring app) but am uninstalling and giving a low rating because after i has colored the 1st 6-or-so pics of the story i was asked to pay $6.99 to continue. This app is more expensive and costs a very high price to unlocked very limited features. I have tried many coloring apos and DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS ONE.

I love this game very much but I need more to color cuz I have colored them all. I want to renew my subscription next month but do to nothing more to color but the daily ones I'm sad to say I won't be renewing my subscription. Sorry & this was the only coloring book I will ever download.

title: Lifetime Movie Club
description:
If you love Lifetime movies, then you need Lifetime Movie Club! With a great selection of new and classic movies available at any time, and fresh ones rotated in and out every week, there will always be something new and juicy to choose from. Indulge in your favorite Lifetime movies of all genres, including suspense, drama, true stories, teen movies, and of course, romance. Stream classics like Fifteen and Pregnant, thrillers like The Perfect Stalker, or true stories like Jodi Arias: Dirty Little Secret. We also offer weekly, curated playlists featuring your favorite Hollywood stars.

The best part? It’s only $3.99 per month or $39.99 a year after your FREE 7-day trial for all these great features:
- New movies added weekly
- No commercials
- Curated playlists 
- Continue watching where you left of on your favorite device
- Easy billing through Google Play 
- Automatic monthly or annual renewal 
- Cancel anytime in your Google Play Account Settings
- No TV provider needed
- 7-DAY FREE TRIAL

Note: Free Trial is only valid for first-time subscribers. Movies can only be streamed in the U.S. and U.S. Territories.

Payment is charged to the Google Play account at confirmation of purchase. Your account will be charged for renewal at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can manage your subscription and auto-renewal by visiting Account Settings on your device. If you turn off auto-renew during the current subscription period, your subscription will be canceled for the subsequent period. 

Please contact lmc_support@aenetworks.com if you are experiencing any issues.

title: Vimeo
description:
Discover amazing videos from the world’s best creators, and upload your own—all on your phone and tablet—with Vimeo for Android. 

Watch and share videos in gorgeous HD, minus the ads, and follow categories, channels, and collections to fill your feed with amazing stuff each and every day. Have your own stuff to share? Upload videos from anywhere, and access them whether you’re at home, or on the go. 

With Vimeo for Android, you can: 

Watch videos in gorgeous ad-free HD
• Stream videos in full 1080p HD
• Rejoice in Vimeo’s always ad-free playback 
• Save videos to watch offline
• Chromecast videos to bigger screens 

Easily upload, manage, and share videos
• Upload videos right from your phone or tablet
• Easily manage your video settings and profile
• Share videos privately with people you choose
• Access your videos and collections from anywhere
• Maintain total control with our new video action sheet 

Discover videos and creators you love 
• Follow categories, creators, and more to customize your feed 
• Tap the Explore icon to discover new videos and creators you’ll love 
• Delight daily in a fresh batch of Staff Picks, hand-selected by our team 
• Dive into different human-curated categories like Animation, Documentary, Travel and more

Download the app for free to start watching incredible videos from the Vimeo community, and sharing some of your own. 

Have feedback for us? Vimeo is full of actual humans who’d love to listen. Go to vimeo.com/help/contact to get in touch.

Stream world-class TV from Britain and beyond, wherever you go! To get started, download the Acorn TV app and sign up for a 7-day free trial.
 
Hailed as “Netflix for the Anglophile” by NPR, Acorn TV offers hard-to-find gems, timeless classics, and newly-discovered favorites from Britain, Ireland, Australia, and beyond. Start a 7-day free trial to watch such fan favorites as Doc Martin, A Place to Call Home, Murdoch Mysteries, Brokenwood Mysteries, Midsomer Murders, and Line of Duty, as well as Acorn TV Originals you can’t stream anywhere else, including Agatha Raisin, Loch Ness, Manhunt, and Mystery Road.

comments: Good shows, glitchy app. "Sorry, we are unable to load this stream." I get that a lot. I love these shows when the app actually works. It's not my wifi or phone. Because everything else on my phone works. And sometimes it just randomly loses connection. Disappointing. Acorn TV does work on my desktop TV, however. Is there. Setting I'm overlooking?

Buffers every 30s secs the last couple of days...so frustrating!!!! I am still on my 7 day trial so can't say if this is normal or not. It never happens with any of my other streaming apps so I know it is not my device. Also it rarely seems to be able to start a show from where it left and doesn't always recognise an episode has been watched.

The Acorn programming is great but the app is very poor. Here are a couple of the problems I have with the app: When casting to my TV I have to start the program on the app then cast it, otherwise the cast attempt fails. The "recently watched" section of the app lists the same two shows for months even though I have watched several dozen shows by now. The app doesn't keep track of the episodes that you've watched in a series, so you have to figure out which episode is next every time you watch.

Theifs!!! They will give you a free trial for week, like most things you give them your card information so they can charge you after the free trial. However contrary to following their instructions there's no way to cancel. I tried to cancel on my phone cancel on my computer add to cancel through your fire TV those instructions and it gives you no ability to what does is let you sign out at the top of it. Also they claim that their customer service can't cancel your account for you. Fraud fraud

Not impressed at all. Is there a point to even telling you. I've tried contacting you and apparently not email to you will not send. I cant get anything from the app "sorry cant stream or load" is the standard message I get. If I cant access so.ething I'm paying you for then what is the point. This nonsense has happened before. I get no help, no way of contacting you. Not even sure u will get this either. So basically I'm paying "acorn" for absolutely nothing.

comments: Great app just like the others. Only a couple of navigation issues like swiping is a bit unresponsive in the store. Also you should make it so that when you open a pack the menu goes back to the last pack you opened. Very inconvenient to keep having to scroll down to the same pack 20 times. Other than that beautiful work as usual. Love collecting things and this scratches that itch
So slow and unresponsive. I've turned the effects off and that doesn't even change anything regarding the performance. This is terrible compared to the performance of the other games.

For a game that is based off a franchise that started off as a comic book series, it's really disappointing to see that this is just from the two shows. I've never watched the series and I have zero intention to do so. I give this one three stars simply because I know there's people out there who love this show (and thus this game), I'm just disappointed that Topps clearly has no rights nor interest of having actual art in this series.

I can't get past the option to learn about the "new features" on the opening screen. Neither the 'No, thanks' nor 'Yes, please' buttons respond to being tapped, rendering me trapped inside of the help menu. Removing this interuption or implementing a mandatory tutorial system such as the one in Topps SLAM 19 would both fix this problem and doubtlessly earn you a 5star rating from me. This issue occurs for me on BUNT, STAR WARS, KICK, etc.
Love the app but not to crazy about to the diamonds odds compared to coins odds..i feel people who can't afford to buy diamonds has a chance at all the cards available

title: Paint Color: Color by Number
description:
Happy new year!
Trapped under a mountain of pressure, with heaps of work to do and not enough hours in the day? We’ve all been there. Sometimes, it’s easy to forget there’s a world of beauty out there...

That’s where Paint Color comes in. Open Paint Color, and in one second you’ll be whisked away to a world of wonder - a relaxing journey on which you can enjoy your own personalized painting paradise!

A coloring book in the palm of your hand – open it and instantly forget your worries. Enjoy art, culture, freedom, and creativity, and unwind completely.

Paint Color features a rich variety of pictures, diverse painting styles, captivating color collocations, as well as a variety of cultural and landscape images from around the world – the choice is yours! 

Creating a masterpiece is now as easy as one, two, three – all you need to do is match the colors according to the numbers and immerse yourself in a sea of self-expression. Unleash the artist within you! 

Download Paint Color for free and get painting now!


Main Features:
- Convenient and Fast: Take out your mobile phone anytime and anywhere to enjoy an immersive coloring experience.

- Various Themes: Cute pets, beautiful flowers, stunning models – with a huge number of themes available, there’s something for everyone! 

- Daily Spotlight: Every day, selected images are hand-picked just for you, bringing color and positivity into your life whenever you need it.

Take a step back and enjoy life in color. Take a step into the world of Paint Color.

Follow us for all the latest Paint Color news and info!
https://www.facebook.com/PaintColor.ColorByNumber

Terms of Services : http://www.searona.com/index.html?id=service
Privacy Policy : http://www.searona.com/index.html?id=policy

comments: I give this 3 stars because of 1 thing. This app takes it upon itself to tell you when you have to "give your eyes a break" now that would be fine if the screen went black for 10 seconds or so. But nope, straight to an add. That is not resting your eyes. Other than that it's not a bad app. Enough free pictures to paint and color.

2-28-20 Update: I have a Galaxy S9+ and it just went through a major update and I can no longer download the pictures I color. I have restated my phone and that didn't work. Can you fix on your end? ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS COLORING APP!!!!! THE PICTURES ARE PHENOMENAL!!! One request would be dragons and I would be in heaven!!! I tried the other coloring apps and they don't have the amazing colors and don't compare to Paint Color. This is the only coloring app I will use!!!

First off, loved the game play. HOWEVER, when I first downloaded the app, I got an ad every once and a while. I tried the free trial, now I get an ad before and after every picture as well as after 1:50 into the picture, every time, it shows an ad. I was working on one for about 12 minutes and had seen 5 ads. It's one thing before and after but to continuously and very frequently show ads during the picture, ridiculous. I love the functionality but have to delete. Sorry can't do it.

This app is greedy. Not only does it constantly have ads and interrupts you when you're coloring, but it's constantly asking you to buy the premium membership and use microtransactions. But if that's not all, when you click on a free image that has an ad, it says "No video available", bit click on an image that doesn't have an ad icon and it immediately plays an ad. I'm done with this.

Love doing most of these pictures, they're pretty, and theres a range for everyone, but omg stop with the ads already.... Before a picture, after a picture, "rest your eyes" less than 3 minutes into the picture and every 3 minutes after that.... If i wanted to "rest my eyes i would put my phone down. Its ok for ads every now and then, or to unlock certain pictures and gain hints, but god dam it i cant hack it.... Sort this out or i will just end up deleting this app....
