title: TFC: Watch Pinoy TV & Movies
description:
Get our FREE app today and gain instant access to hundreds of Filipino blockbuster movies, shows, TV episodes, LIVE news and sports as a TFC member. TRY IT AND DOWNLOAD NOW!

If you are not a TFC registered member GET TFC now by logging on to our website (https://tfc.tv) to immediately start enjoying your favorite Pinoy programs.

NEW FEATURES!

▶  Seamless watching of videos on your computer,  smart TV, game console,  streaming player, phone or tablet. This 
means you can start watching on your phone while on your way to work and  finish the same show on your SmartTV when you get home!

▶  Continue watching feature enable you to keep a track of your shows. You may begin watching a show on one device and resume watching on another right where you left off.

▶  Download, Watch Later allows you to watch TV shows and movies anytime, anywhere even when you’re offline.

▶  Add to My List feature helps you to personalize your video viewing  experience by making your own video playlist of your favorite shows.

▶  Multi-User Access allows you to share your experience as you can extend your account to three other family members or friends.

USE of TFC.Tv is subject to TFC Terms & Conditions: http://tfc.tv/terms-and-conditions

Please email us at support@tfc.tv or chat with our 24/7 live support http://tfc.tv/help

Enjoy optimal app usage with Android 4.1 to 6.x phones and tablets.

I was charged for the premium that doesn't even work... I have emailed and have not received a response.
I paid and subscribed to your premium acccount but I still don't have any accesss. Such a scam.

Cant Access my Account for several days now. Money taken out of my bank since feb 24th and asked if I recieved confirmation. Tried to uninstall and installed the app again and still can't access it. Still saying free!!!! That's for sure I dont have this problem as many people is not happy with your service. After taking the money you are not providing the service that we paid for??? description:
Sundance Now brings you the best in original and exclusive dramas, true crime, political thrillers, and more. We believe in the power of storytelling, and are committed to bringing our members authentic, emotional narratives from unexpected global perspectives. Sign up today for unlimited access to thousands of hours of ad-free streaming.

• Thousands of hours of exclusive, unmissable TV from the UK, Canada, and Australia
• Home to acclaimed Sundance Now Originals and exclusives not found anywhere else.

comments: This is a review for the Sundance Now streaming service, not the app. The app is fine. But I have tried streaming this from a phone, a tablet, and a browser. All of them error time out, freeze, and stop streaming. It's a huge shame because the shows on there look amazing and I really would love to watch them.... just the streaming itself is terrible. I wish it would be better. So bummed.

It was fine. I got the free trial just to watch No One Saw a Thing. It was excellent, for the record. I made this review just to counter all the reviews criticizing it because they said it's hard to cancel. I was concerned going in but was able to cancel with 30 seconds simply by going into my account on the browser instead of the app. Amazon Prime and Audible are both much harder to cancel on. I appreciate the free trial but there's not enough content to make it worth paying for. Good luck!

I'm having problems with in the middle of viewing a video, the video will stop and I get a "cannot play content" notice. I'm not able to resume the content OR any other content. After a phone restart or even app restart I'm unable to watch a complete movie or show.
Don't download! Have to add a creditcard before you can even see what they have, and can't cancel membership on app. Help desk hasn't gotten back in touch with me. Not worth the money, or the effort
The 7 day free is great. Minute it ends you are charged and trying to cancel is an exercise in futility. Had to finally contact my credit card company to stop making payments to them.

title: Nimo TV – Live Game Streaming
description:
---------ABOUT NIMO TV---------
A leading global platform that allows millions of gamers from all around the world to play and broadcast their games to other like-minded players. Nimo TV is a community of players, gamers, and fans that drive conversation, and allows peer-to-peer rewards and recognition. Utilising high-quality interactive technology, audiences can interact with streamers, and gain access to exclusive E-Sports events and tournaments, along with unprecedented access to the top streamers from across the region.
 
---------INTRODUCTION TO NIMO TV---------
Never play alone. Join the latest dynamic community of gamers where millions of players
gather on their games and devices, interact on a daily basis, and catch the best and
brightest in the casual and professional gaming scene around the world. As players hone
their skills and craft in popular video games, regardless of platforms, audiences can join in on the fun and action.
Come join the experience by viewing the thousands of streams available - learn from the
best, reward the masters, as Nimo TV shows you how.

Top Live Game Streaming Platform
The art of playing video games has always been supported by an audience, who watch, comment and critique the gaming styles of gamers. And that audience has been watching and evolving. The act of sharing, and fostering a positive culture for players to find and entertain an audience, and supporting them to develop a community, is our goal.
 
■Our Belief
Anyone who can play a game, can share their experience.
 
■Our Mission
We make it as easy as possible for gamers across the global stage to showcase their talents and expertise, entertain new audiences, and for gamers to catch the latest online engagement.
 
■Our Vision
Connecting players at home, overseas, and everywhere and anywhere you can play a game.

Currently really disappointed by this app because of it's performance,It really takes forever to load a single page and there is lot of performance issues needs to fix and the app is poorly optimized for low end devices. It's very slow. Hope the devs fix these issues in future updates.

Good app works well . But one problem the lucky draw needs to be change . The probability for getting diamonds or other grand prize should be higher . Everytime I spin I get only 50 coins . If you just give coins don't advertise that because you are fooling people.

comments: Horrible app you have right here. I mean what the heck is up with 35 seconds long ads very 10 seconds. How the heck are we supposed to use the app if that keeps happening?! Your platform is also poorly designed for navigation...stupid app doesn't even save faces and I have to start frm scratch again....again, stupid app doesn't even allow me to save my edited videos...What the heck?!!! Rubbish!

I think that starting with the app to lead you to a way to sign into a subscription immediately seems pretty scammy... was able to figure out how to get past the subscription portion, but app doesnt work if you use gallery photo. Bounding box for face changes after you tap save, so app doesnt work and tries to scam you into a subscription before you find out.

What an awful app. Nothing functions properly, im not one to write reviews but this is just too bad. I saw an add and tried cheering up my friend by making a funny video with the app. I opened the app and suprise 30 ad. I closed the ad and as soon as I pressed the photo button more ads the servers take for ever to load anything and was stuck at loading screens for over 10 minutes god forbid I accidentally hit the screen and get more ad spam when I did get the app to work i couldn't even share it

Need to pay in order to actually use the app. It would be a great app if this wasn't the case. Fix this please. Might I also add, what you're doing is false advertising as you don't explicitly say in the description that you need to pay just to have the "free" Trial. Thank you devs for wasting my time.

When you go to crop an image of a friend the outlined selfie placement thing moves a little up and to the right after yhe photo has been taken.. very disappointed with that as that is the main feature of this app... why i gave 2 stars was because well 1. That problem and 2. Other than that its an okay app, its a little laggy also.. but for €10.99 a month its definitely not worth it. I hope you can fix this issue, thanks! J.

title: HAKUNA Live - Meet, Chat and Play Live
description:
Hakuna is an interactive live streaming app in which anyone can meet and chat!

😀 Enjoy multi-guest Live!
- Hakuna is specially designed for guest live.
- You can invite multiple guests to make your live much more fun.

🎙 Easy radio mode!
- You can easily change the radio/video mode during live.
- Feel free to broadcast anywhere you want using radio mode!

🎉 Various broadcast contents!
- Hakuna’s live streaming is more exciting than any other TV shows.
- Fun and interesting broadcast contents are created every second that audience can easily participate in.

⭐️ Meet, Chat, Play Live! And earn money!
- Anyone can receive gifts. 
- Even if you are not a host, join as a guest to receive gifts from the audience!

💓 Interactive broadcasts
- Don’t just watch other’s broadcasts, share your thoughts and interest by sending comments and gifts.
- Follow the streamers you like to become their first guest!


*The app requests the following permissions:
- External storage : Download, save and upload pictures
- Microphone : Delivering sound during live broadcast
- Camera : Delivering videos during live broadcast

title: HypeUp: Make Funny Gifs, Videos & eCards
description:
Become a selfie star! Take a selfie and create awesome funny GIFS, ECARDS and even VIDEOS with your face! For daily use or special occasions like Birthday, St. Valentine’s Day, New Year, Christmas, and much more! Express any emotions you feel with gifs and videos.

Now you can easily make gifs and videos with you and your friends! It’s much more interesting than face emojis or stickers! Adorable gifs, videos, ecards, music and dance videos are ready to be shared! You can use your new video, gif or image for texting, sharing to friends and for your best content in social media. 

How to use HypeUp app?
1. Turn on your mobile camera.
2. Take a selfie.
3. Check your face.
4. Choose gif or video frames in our huge content base. 
5. Save your gif/video. 
6. Or share them in one click to social media and messengers. 
7. Don't stop smiling :)

Note that you can use HypeUp for any type of your content in the social networks, enjoy!

comments: The intro is great but, I doesn't want me to use it, I clicked everything in. My screen to move it away but it still says "are you sure" it's forcing me to buy the free trial, wich is sooooooo annoying, I really hate this app, when I saw this on Facebook I was exited downloading this app when I opened it I exitment turned into anger. This app ain't my type

I will be honest. There are a lot of issues with this. Where to start? How about $30 a week? I have had this on my phone for less than an hour. Already it has crashed at least 5 times 3 of those when I chose a new pic. 2 random. Try as hard as you want to get it right but the face always seems to be off. It is slow to render also. I don't like to be be negative on apps people have busted their behinds on. There is a 3 day trial that you can use to decide. Could be a fun app. Has potential.

£39.49 A WEEK? A WEEK!!! IS THIS A JOKE? I didnt even bother trying this app as you have to subscribe with a payment card just to try it out, and was too scared I'd get charged. Probably buy whole software which can do this for the price this is asking a month ...... just stupid ......

First of all, whenever I try to take the picture of someone, it always cuts off half the face. Second, you should be able to take atleast 3 pictures before the limit is up. And third, this is overall just a bad app, bad directions, it makes you stay on the page of getting the free trial for way too long and I think everyone can agree that 29.99$ is way to much to pay for this app.

Dude. Just like, DUDE. So cool app and all, it's easy to use and has a good selection of videos and such but jeez, $30!?! FOR A WEEK. That's a ridiculous price for an editing app. Like I might pay $30 for the whole app, but every week? What a waste.

title: Paint Color : Coloring Games & Adult Coloring Book
description:
Happy New Year!
🌼 Paint Color : Coloring Games & Adult Coloring Book: Explore daily new pics and paint by number to make your own adult coloring book!! 
🌸 You can choose from a wide range of coloring artworks and paint by number with great pleasure! It’s an entertaining way to kill time and release your inner artist for free. All you need to do is painting color by the right numbers and you will achieve a beautiful sandbox coloring masterpiece, without any skills, pencils or papers! 

------ Key Features of Color Puzzle & Adult Coloring Book------ 
🍭 Swift & Easy to Draw your own pictures:
Don‘t know how to draw sandbox coloring pics? Don’t worry, Color Puzzle & Adult Coloring Book create a new way to experience adult coloring with no specific skills, pencils or papers. All you need do is to choose a number and color, then tap the shade to follow the clues.
🎨 New designed paintings Daily updated: 
All the paintings in Coloring Games：Color Puzzle & Adult Coloring Book are carefully designed by our own designers. We will provide you with tons of paint color choices and update paintings everyday. We'll also update special themes when festivals come: Halloween theme, Thanksgiving theme, Christmas theme and so on.
🍯 Various Images in Different Categories: 
There are a variety of coloring pages in different categories: Special, Character, Nature, Animals… You can color by number with people and animals, flowers and landscapes, special unicorn and mandala etc. We will constantly update the categories and pictures!
⭐ Color by number Anytime & Anywhere:
Coloring books or sandbox coloring pages with simple numbers and color paint will calm you down. You can paint by numbers Anytime & Anywhere to relax. 
🍻 Share and Post your Paintings On Social Networks: 
You can easily download your finished paintings, share with your friends, and post them on social networks (Instagram, Facebook, Snapchat and so on). Recommend the app to others and play together! 

------ Other Features of Color Puzzle & Adult Coloring Book ----- 
💘 Review your painting process by watching short video after completing color by number!
💘 Download your color paint by numbers pic to set it as wallpaper!
💘 More kind of paint by numbers pics such as pixel art, sandbox coloring, halloween theme…
💘 Explore achievements system and get bonus for more hints and special coloring book!

🤔 Coloring Games: Color Puzzle & Adult Coloring book is an adult coloring book: coloring games and puzzles offline will help you finish an art work while relax your body. And it’s also an attractive coloring book for younger: painting by numbers will improve their patience, concentration and color discrimination ability. You will find so many free paint by number pictures in this app which suit for both younger and adult coloring!

More functions and pictures to be continued!💪🏼Special Halloween pics updated already! Enjoy painting and adult coloring by number now!!🤗 

If you have any suggestions for Color Puzzle & Adult Coloring Book app, please contact us: paintcolor.feedback@gmail.com❗️

comments: I would give this app 5 stars, if it let me play it more often. Every time I tap on a pic to color, it says there's a network connection error, even though my phone says the connection strength is excellent. Clicking on "try again" doesn't doesn't work even tho I try multiple times. Occasionally it will immediately load the pic and I can color one, but not very often. It's a shame, cuz the pics are amazing and it would prolly be my favorite coloring app (I have 7) if it wasn't for this problem.

It's the best game it has alot of options for coloring pictures you can understand Wie it says adult coloring for some of the pictures but I do wish there weren't so much ads It's really relaxing and if I'm mad all I need to do is color a picture and BOOM back to normal I wish I could play this game all day long and if it's a little bit of a glitch like mine was when I first got the game I got rid of it than got the game agne then it was fine I'm satisfied with the game trust me it's the best❤❤

It wont let me open up too many of the pictures. Black square pops up saying some type of error. Also some other photos lets me watch the video to unlock picture then it says network error or bad internet connection try again. Its a guessing game. Ill watch the videos to unlock and nothing so annoying ads to not color the photo i chose. This app has too many bugs and if not fixed i will delete. Thats why i gave 2 starts. To many malfunctions in this app. Though the photos im able to color great

Ok so this is a update on my last review, If you turn on online this app will work amazingly! But if your looking for a offline drawing app this isn't going to work for you! And they say you can download the pictures and use it offline, but I tried that and it still won't work offline.

I'm honestly disappointed. I read another review saying that you hid some of the things and it almost forces you to have to use hints, I thought, "surely it can't be that bad" Oh, no, it is. It's terrible. They didn't even try to cover the fact that they do it, there's a hidden one or multiple hidden for almost ever color. It's ridiculous and annoying. The paintings are pretty though, the only good thing I can say.

comments: This app is the best! It allows 11+ and it has many different things to do! It's kind of like tik tok but with your own avatar and there are many different worlds and maps and servers to explore! And there are new poses every day/week! And there are crews that you can join,you can even make your own!and there are blind dates! And also a quiz to take for a soulmate for any sexuality! It's fun and I highly recommend it!

Excellent app! Zepeto is absolutely a great game. I never get bored of it. People, please do not listen to the false rumors of this app. Zepeto does not track you! Someone asked why does it need microphone access, it needs it because in the game, you can record videos where you can have your zepetos face on yours, you can talk in the video!! The rumors of this app are absolutely stupid! Dont worry, just get the app, it's fun!

I love zepeto so much because I love socializing . But these days i keep disconnecting from the world. I know my connection is bad but I have no problem going on world without disconnecting before (my network have always been bad). Is this because of my connection or because the server error? I can go on a room that have very least people and when people starts crowding, I straight away got disconnected. Please fix this because I really love zepeto. Thank you.

i think it's a great fun game where you can see other people's worlds and get to socialize with people, but unfortunately i have to give it 3 stars for a few reasons. idk if this is just me but sometimes, whenever i'm trying to go to a world, after the world loads, the screen just freezes and doesn't let me do anything in the game which is kind of annoying, i would appreciate it if you could fix that. overall, good game with just some few bugs.

Amazing!👍💛I can change my character, send messages to my friends, post photos etc, the only problem is that when I try to set a background from MY photos, it bugs and also it takes a long time to load. It's probably my phone but if it isn't it would be nice if you could find a way to fix this. Also could add sending photos on the messages? Thank you so so much for adding my idea, it really makes messaging easier!! If I could do more than 5 stars I would put 1,000,000 stars thank you!!!!!⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

title: Singing Machine Karaoke
description:
Sing your heart out with Singing Machine Karaoke, in partnership with Stingray Karaoke. Pair the app to your karaoke machine for the ultimate singing experience! Enjoy a selection of free songs, updated monthly, or purchase an in-app subscription to access thousands of songs.

YOU WANT IT? WE’VE GOT IT! The new & noteworthy + the unforgettable oldies
- Take your pick from over 14,000* karaoke songs
- Look forward to new songs added every Friday
- Can’t choose? Browse popular songs, recent additions, song charts, artists, by decade or language
- Search by artists, title, or lyrics
- Expansive catalog includes pop, rock, R&B, hip-hop, Disney, country, Latin, and more!

Enjoy hits in the style of:
⭐️ Let it Go (Disney) / Cast of Frozen
⭐️ Shake it Off / Taylor Swift
⭐️Fight Song / Rachel Platten
⭐️ Happy / Pharrell Williams
⭐️Thunder / Imagine Dragons
⭐️ Party in the U.S.A. / Miley Cyrus
⭐️ Girl on Fire / Alicia Keys
⭐️ Tennessee Whiskey / Chris Stapleton

And sing along to oldies in the style of:
⭐️ Sweet Caroline (Good Times Never Seems so Good) / Neil Diamond
⭐️ Bohemian Rhapsody / Queen
⭐️ Livin’ on a Prayer / Bon Jovi
⭐️ Eye of the Tiger / Survivor
⭐️ I Will Survive / Gloria Gaynor
⭐️ Hound Dog / Elvis Presley
⭐️ Ring of Fire / Johnny Cash

QUICK & EASY: Ready, set, sing!
- Start the party with popular ready-made mixes
- Connect with BlueTooth®† to enjoy singing along to amplified music with any compatible Singing Machine (audio only)
- Cast videos to your TV with Google Chromecast

SING IT YOUR WAY: Customize your experience
- Be the DJ and queue up to 100 of your favorite songs
- Sing on your own, or with the help of lead vocals (when available)
- Watch high-quality videos or save on bandwidth by choosing lyrics on a black screen


CHOOSE YOUR PLAN: Access songs for FREE or purchase an in-app subscription
- FREE: Every month, access 5 full-length songs. Browse the rest of the catalog and sample 30-seconds of any song.
- 9.99$: WEEKLY ACCESS Perfect if you want to try out the app or access the full song catalog for a karaoke party! Billed weekly, this subscription auto-renews unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
- 14.99$: MONTHLY ACCESS Get the most out of your karaoke singing! Billed monthly, this subscription auto-renews unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.

Payment will be charged to your Google Play Store Account at the time of purchase (or auto-renewal) in your local currency equivalent to the USD value as determined by the Google Play Store

To turn off auto-renewal, launch the Google Play Store, tap the menu, select subscriptions. Tap MANAGE for Singing Machine Karaoke, then select Cancel subscription.

View Stingray’s Privacy Policy: 
http://www.stingray.com/en/privacy-policy

Learn more about The Singing Machine at www.singingmachine.com 

*Number of songs available varies by territory.
**Singing Machine system must have BlueTooth® functionality. When using Bluetooth®, only audio is transmitted to the Singing Machine, the lyrics will not display on the machine’s built-in monitor.

Montreal, Quebec, Canada
H3C 1T4
recentChanges:
We've fixed a bug. Please update to enjoy singing karaoke with the mobile app and your Singing Machine.

If you have questions or comments, just email them to karaokesupport@stingray.com, and we'll be pleased to assist you.
comments: Complete waste of time if you plan on using with a Singing Machine Karaoke System because the machine is so cheaply made you wont be able to use it more than once. Plus the price is outrageous $14.99 a month for a very small amount of music and song choices. Save your self the hassle and just look up Karaoke Music on YouTube for free and choose any song you want? You're welcome! Thank you for reading!

Its a quality machine for the price. We are really getting to enjoy it more, now that we are staying home to help flatten the curve. Never a dull moment, it helps us forget about our situation and we can even bluetooth to our tv or any device with bluetooth and sing along with the radio or youtube, its lots of fun and good times. Thank you for allowing us this time to enjoy singing along to more songs.

Honestly, this app is really amazing! I also really love my singing mashine very much!! I tried out the mobile app and let me just say, it's not that bad for a karaoke app! I you guys put all of my favorite songs and artists on the app! I can just sing my heart out and enjoy!!🖤🖤🖤 great app! Keep up the incredible work!! Love Anna-

It is exactly what I was looking karaoke app for a friend's party and spending time together but not for singing competition or showing off. It cast to TV, have lead singer that you can switch on/off, and decent catalogue of songs. As a thought it would be great if there was an option to adjust volume for lead singer.

Awful. I bought this for a Christmas present and started the subscription but it will not display any words to the machine screen or the hdmi out connected to the big screen. Is my daughter's machine broke or do you have to use the phone with the app for the words?

title: Globoplay
description:
Dê um play no nosso conteúdo a qualquer momento e de onde estiver!

Séries internacionais, filmes, programação completa da Globo, desenhos e séries do Gloob, BBB ao vivo, além de produções exclusivas. Temos histórias para toda a família.

Você ainda pode baixar programas no seu celular ou tablet para assistir offline onde quiser, sem precisar de internet. São mais de 140 novelas e séries nacionais disponíveis para download. 

Assinante Globoplay tem benefícios exclusivos:

- Séries internacionais renomadas.
- Estreias antecipadas de séries e produções exclusivas.
- Grandes sucessos do cinema.
- Capítulos e episódios completos de novelas, séries e programas de humor da Globo.
- BBB ao vivo, 24 horas por dia.
- Desenhos animados e séries do Gloob.
- Produções históricas da Globo.
- Baixar para assistir offline.

E no Globoplay você pode gratuitamente:

- Assistir aos programas de jornalismo, esportes e variedades.
- Rever trechos das novelas, séries e programas de humor da Globo.
- Acompanhar a Globo ao vivo no seu celular, tablet, computador ou Android TV. (Consulte a disponibilidade do serviço na sua região em globoplay.com/ajuda). 

Prefira usar o Globoplay em redes Wi-Fi. Assistir a vídeos nas redes 3G e 4G pode consumir muito do seu pacote de dados.

Termos e políticas 
Ao fazer download deste aplicativo você concorda com nossos termos e políticas, localizados em www.globoplay.com/termosepoliticas.

comments: Globoplay works fine on my laptop but this app only works when it wants to. I've been deleting and installing it over and over again and I still cant watch bbb clicks.

I love all the content that they have but all the time the app doesn't work and show that I need to log in again when I pay for it, and then I need to restart to keep using. They have to work in the issues and later make you pay for use, cause now the money thay you pay is not worth it.

Still needs work. If you are going to charge as much as Netflix, you should at least test the app properly. It doesn't cast to chromecast properly. It's always restarting the videos. Also, there is no option to start where you left off.
Extremely bad flow. There are shows that I can't watch at all because the app keeps on crashing when I click play. Big wast of money.
The flow is very bad. Always stop to recharge, even when my connection is stable and very good

title: Talking Animals
description:
🐭 Toppy - My Talking Pet- is the realistic application for animating animals and voice change. Now the talking pets and Talking animals in the photos can come to life. Upload live photos of animals: dogs and cats,  birds, puppies and get live videos with your lovely pets. My talking pet are funny. Create interesting videos with pets and share them.

Today, beloved friends will be able to speak and congratulate you on the holiday. Record audio, apply voice change from puppy to robo and enjoy the pleasure of pet.

🥇 The My Talking Pet provides the following features:
- 3d animation talking animals
- initial image of animals for quick use
- realistic talking animals
- real time voice changer from puppy to robo
- share the talking pet movie
- a variety of masks, filters and effects for pets

🎼 Join and have fun with your favorite talking animals!

For any feedback, please contact us at: support@toppyapp.com
Many thanks & best regards, Toppy Team

title: Nonolive - Live Streaming & Video Chat
description:
Nonolive is the most interesting global live broadcast platform, brings together many high-quality contracted anchors, amateur beauties and game advanced players to share happiness and passion with you. The featured feature is online real-time interaction. You can chat with your favorite anchor in real time and share your feeling with other audiences.

Download Nonolive now! You won’t be lonely any more cause there will always be someone to accompany you.

「Main Features」
Attractive anchors:
Exclusive star-show beauties, talented and charming. Amateur beauties, shy and pure. There is always one you like.

Game live:
LOL, Arena of Valor, PUBG, Hearthstone, Minecraft and other popular games live 24 hours. In addition, there are PUBG teaching, AoV teaching, LOL teaching, and Hearthstone teaching to help you rank higher.

One-click broadcast:
In addition to the computer broadcast, the mobile phone also supports one-click broadcast. You can share your happiness anytime, anywhere. As long as your soul is interesting, you can be the brightest star..

Multiplayer video chat:
Support up to 6 people to connect with video, meet friends from all over the world, and experience the passion and collision of multiculturalism.

Fantastic gift effects:
Rose, luxury cars, or even rockets. As many as dozens of hundreds of gifts, there is always one that can meet your needs.

Fans group:
Join an exclusive fan group of anchors, obtain exclusive fans badges and various privileges. 


「Contact us」
Download and Follow us on social media:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Nonolive/
Youtube: http://bit.ly/Nonolive_YT
Instagram: @nonoliveid
Website: www.nonolive.com

Your questions and feedback are always welcome! Please email us at: support@nonolive.com

title: GameHouse Original Stories
description:
If you love stories and games, you’ll love our GameHouse Original Stories. 

This app is the perfect gateway to our complete catalog of story games. Discover loveable characters and relatable stories to warm your heart, and feel like part of their family! Also be the first to know about new releases and have our entire universe at your fingertips. 

All this with the free GameHouse Original Stories app!
 
📖  NEVER MISS A GAME RELEASE with our notification system
 
📖 FOLLOW YOUR FAVORITE STORIES and find all the available games in the series
 
📖 FIND UPCOMING STORIES and go behind the scenes with concept art and more!
 
📖 FREE AND EASY TO USE, you'll never have a problem finding exactly the information you want
 
📖 HOME OF OUR NEW SUBSCRIPTION. If you’re a subscriber, the app has even more to offer! Manage your subscription, explore exclusive subscriber content and find your next story to fall in love with
 
💬 CONTACT US from within the app for fast assistance with any problem or question
 
All of our story games are free to try, with an in-app purchase to unlock the full game if you choose. Subscribers have full access to all games for as long as they are a subscriber.
 
Follow some of the GameHouse Original Story Stars on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/GameHouseOriginalStories/

comments: I purchased the full gamehouse series for $9.99 a month which suppose to come with unlimited plays on the games. I play the gamehouse delicious World mostly and instead of there being unlimited plays with the unlimited access subscription it's only giving me 5 hats. I even tried to press the restore purchase that's in the settings but nothing is changing. There was also a time when it did give me unlimited plays for a few days but stopped again. Please fix my issue asap

I love these games. And I totally subscribed to the app but I'm having difficulty playing games on my phone because it says that I have to buy them. I have had them email me a code and then it seems fine but then it boots me back to putting in an email again. I really want to play the games on my phone but I can't because it says I have to subscribe and I'm already a subscriber and I don't want to be paying double. Please Help!

These games are good, well made.. but I don't understand why we have to continuously pay for them? $10.00 monthly for a game is a bit much if you ask me. If I only had to pay one time, than even that would be more understandable. If you have so many fans why make them pay so much!! 🤷‍♀️🤷‍♀️🤷‍♀️🤷‍♀️

This app works great on my tablets and phones (iPad, Samsung galaxy tablets and Samsung galaxy phones). I gave this 5 stars, only downside is that out of all the collectable cards, we earn more than there are items to buy. we should have more clothing/accessory items for our avatars. But in all seriousness, the app hasn't crashed yet (at least of no fault to itself... ie: me crashing it while doing other things that crash other apps when I do it.). I love all the games and their replay value

It's good in a way but It's no point in keeping the membership when you have played all the limited amount of games. Might as well say we bought them all already while waiting on the next to come out.

title: The Criterion Channel
description:
A movie lover’s dream, the Criterion Channel offers classics and discoveries from around the world, thematically programmed with special features, on a streaming service brought to you by the Criterion Collection.

With constantly refreshed selections of Hollywood, international, art-house, and independent movies, plus access to Criterion’s entire streaming library of more than 1,000 important classic and contemporary films, there’s something new to choose from every day of the week on the Criterion Channel. Start with Sunday Spotlights on directors, stars, genres, and themes; Tuesday’s Short + Feature; or the Friday double bill. Try out our 15-minute-a-month film school, Observations on Film Art, or choose from suggestions by friends like Barry Jenkins, Guillermo del Toro, or Mira Nair. Go deep with the Criterion Collection’s archive of special features for context that no other service can match.

FEATURES

- The Criterion Collection’s streaming library, including many complete editions released on Blu-ray and DVD, as well as unreleased titles
- Ongoing programs of Hollywood, international, art-house, independent, documentary, and short films, including thematic programming, director and star retrospectives, and guest-curated series
- Original Criterion Channel series such as Observations on Film Art, Adventures in Moviegoing, and Art-House America
- Supplemental features to deepen your appreciation of the art of film, including audio commentaries, behind-the-scenes footage, scholarly analyses, introductions, new and archival interviews, and trailers
 

To access all features and content you can subscribe to The Criterion Channel on a monthly or yearly basis with an auto-renewing subscription right inside the app.* Pricing can vary by region and will be confirmed before purchase in the app. In app subscriptions will automatically renew at the end of their cycle.

* All payments will be paid through your Google Account and may be managed under Account Settings after the initial payment. Subscription payments will automatically renew unless deactivated at least 24-hours before the end of the current cycle. Your account will be charged for renewal at least 24-hours prior to the end of the current cycle. Any unused portion of your free trial will be forfeited upon payment. Cancellations are incurred by disabling auto-renewal.

descriptionHTML:
A movie lover’s dream, the Criterion Channel offers classics and discoveries from around the world, thematically programmed with special features, on a streaming service brought to you by the Criterion Collection.

With constantly refreshed selections of Hollywood, international, art-house, and independent movies, plus access to Criterion’s entire streaming library of more than 1,000 important classic and contemporary films, there’s something new to choose from every day of the week on the Criterion Channel. Start with Sunday Spotlights on directors, stars, genres, and themes; Tuesday’s Short + Feature; or the Friday double bill. Try out our 15-minute-a-month film school, Observations on Film Art, or choose from suggestions by friends like Barry Jenkins, Guillermo del Toro, or Mira Nair. Go deep with the Criterion Collection’s archive of special features for context that no other service can match.

FEATURES

- The Criterion Collection’s streaming library, including many complete editions released on Blu-ray and DVD, as well as unreleased titles
- Ongoing programs of Hollywood, international, art-house, independent, documentary, and short films, including thematic programming, director and star retrospectives, and guest-curated series
- Original Criterion Channel series such as Observations on Film Art, Adventures in Moviegoing, and Art-House America
- Supplemental features to deepen your appreciation of the art of film, including audio commentaries, behind-the-scenes footage, scholarly analyses, introductions, new and archival interviews, and trailers


To access all features and content you can subscribe to The Criterion Channel on a monthly or yearly basis with an auto-renewing subscription right inside the app.* Pricing can vary by region and will be confirmed before purchase in the app. In app subscriptions will automatically renew at the end of their cycle.

* All payments will be paid through your Google Account and may be managed under Account Settings after the initial payment. Subscription payments will automatically renew unless deactivated at least 24-hours before the end of the current cycle. Your account will be charged for renewal at least 24-hours prior to the end of the current cycle. Any unused portion of your free trial will be forfeited upon payment. Cancellations are incurred by disabling auto-renewal.

comments: When it actually works, it's great. But then, with no rhyme or reason, it just decides "secure playback not allowed on this device" and won't play anything on my cellphone. I don't understand why you'd say you support platforms and then not actually support them. Incredibly annoying. It's not as if this material hasn't already been pirated - so why are you punishing those who are trying to pay to see it? Fix the app.

The Criterion Channel is the only streaming service you need! The quality of the content puts netflix, hulu, prime etc. to shame. My one request is for the home page to show more of its content and to make it easier to browse by genre and decade. They have lots of movies, but they are hidden away so you have to do some experimental searches. I love that you can download the movies to watch while travelling, or if you're like me, to watch in rural America where there is no internet.

The selection here is fantastic. I've watched around 80 movies since I subscribed last year. The only problem I have is how the films are categorized in the interface. When I click on a film, I want all of the extras to pop up with it, not the other films in the same category. I also want to be able to clear my "Continue Watching" list.

I think the films are great, but i can no longer watch them. I was able to just fine until yesterday, now every film says "cannot play video, this device does not support secure video playback". What a bummer. I tried logging out and logging back in, no luck. Uninstalled and reinstalled the app, no help. I have to say I was frustrated with the user experience before, but this is possibly the last straw.

I would love to see the criterion logo rather than Vimeo when casting to my TV via Chromecast. The app also has issues when casting to a tv - I'll have to disconnect from the TV and kill the app to play a different video and when watching special features and shorts this can get very annoying.

comments: Adds playing during the show!? It plays adds occasionally and I'm fine with that. What I'm NOT fine with is that when my show comes back, the add sounds still play twice through so loud I can't hear the show. And it rewound the show like 20 minutes but I don't have any controls to fast forward. I'm not sure why it's glitching. I've uninstalled and reinstalled the app, restarted my phone, signed out and signed back in. It's stupid annoying.

'Failed to play media' this is what I see 2 seconds into any video. I am a paid subscriber and this happened days after my subscription started. I would like to know why I am not able to watch any episodes.

As a whole, I like what it gives me... But as an app it blows. It keeps having errors, signing me out, it disappears from my desktop so I have to keep reopening the app from the Google store instead of just tapping the icon.

Get ads, then once they are done and the show starts, ads play while the show plays, and there is no pause or fast forward buttons there. Or the ads freeze and you can't watch anything anyways. FIX THIS PLEASE. This app seems to just keep breaking. AFTER AN AD, IT WON'T EVEN SAVE THE PLACE I WAS AT.

Ever since the update a few days ago I am unable to watch shows on this app. I have a paid subscription. My other streaming apps work fine but I'm getting a 4010 error on this app now. Reinstall doesn't fix connection issues. 5 stars for your website content but this mobile app needs fixing. Its It's annoying not being able to watch on my Samsung tablet.

title: Scanner Radio Pro - Fire and Police Scanner
description:
Listen to live audio from over 7,000 fire and police scanners, weather radios, amateur radio repeaters, air traffic and marine radios from around the world.  Turn on notifications to receive alerts anytime a scanner has more than 3500 listeners (find out about major events as they're breaking).

FEATURES

• View scanners located nearest you.
• View the top 50 scanners that have the most listeners.
• View list of scanners added most recently (new scanners are being added all the time).
• Add scanners you listen to the most to your Favorites for quick access.
• Browse the directory by location or genre (public safety, air traffic, railroad, marine, etc).
• Turn on notifications to be notified when major events are happening (details below).
• Add Scanner Radio Pro widgets and shortcuts to your home screen for quick access.
• Supports Android Auto.

NOTIFICATION FEATURES

Receive a notification anytime:

• ...any scanner in the directory has more than 3500 listeners (configurable).
• ...a scanner within a certain distance of your location has more than a certain number of listeners.
• ...a specific scanner has more than a certain number of listeners.
• ...a Broadcastify alert is posted for one of your favorites.
• ...a scanner within a certain distance from you is added to the directory.

In addition to the above features, you also get the following features with this version of the app:

• No ads.
• Access to all 6 theme colors.
• Push notifications sent within 5 minutes (vs within 15 minutes in the free version).
• The ability to record the audio.
• The play button at the bottom of the directory screens and on the widgets can be used to start listening without having to go to the player screen.

The audio you're able to hear is provided by volunteers (and, in many cases, police and fire departments themselves) for Broadcastify and a few other sites using real police scanners and is the same audio you would hear using your own police scanner.

If you need assistance, please go to http://support.gordonedwards.net/

Explanation of why a couple of permissions are needed:

• The "Location" permission is required so that the app can determine what scanners are located in your area when you select "Nearby Scanners". When you select "Nearby Scanners" the app first attempts to determine your location via the network, if that fails the app then tries to determine your location via GPS.

• The "Photos/Media/Files" / "modify or delete the contents of your USB storage" permission is required in order to allow you to record the audio you're hearing and be able to save it to a location that you can access from your computer.

comments: Who can stand ads? Not me, making the essential purchase to remove such things for an experience that shines nicely for a great quality app. Tip - Walking alone at night? Well, turn up the volume on the scanner and instantly know you're that much safer now. It just eases you out of anxiety and you'll make it with your trusted app.

I've just upgraded to the pro version... So haven't had it that long, however I liked it enough (free version) that I sprang for the pro version. I don't anticipate any issues with it. Have used the free version some time now. Good app... I recommend it. 😁

I highly suggest you get the pro version. It is so much better than the ad version. The only time the scanner ever goes down is when the person providing the feed disconnects. It works flawlessly otherwise. I was a beta tester on the other version and decided to get the pro and am very glad I did.

This app adds so much convenience and extra features as opposed to going directly to the Broadcastify website. To me, the differences between the free and Pro version were negligible; but I enjoyed the free version so much that I bought the Pro just to support the developer.

Seems good, I like to listen to Norfolk Southern Railroad when I get to the city and or county they go through, sit by the tracks and watch them roll through; also the only other agencies I can listen to is only Fire & EMS, I've had scanners since my early teen years, I miss not being able to listen to law enforcement these days, as they have all gone to encryption, but thanks for at least providing this scanner app!

Its good n all, it has improved except when I wanna connect it to my smart tv, it just won't. It just said: "Temporary error has occured retry". Back then, when this app haven't updated, I could connect it to my smart tv but the problem was subtitles weren't working on tv. Please fix it.
The app is great but every 11 seconds the video will be buffering and the sign "loading" appears. I don't know whether it is because of the app or the broadband, but it sure is annoying

This app crashes my phone almost EVERY time??? I have to manually restart my phone while watching videos on vlive so I miss out on live content 😐 I have a Galaxy Note 9. Can someone please fix this problem before I delete the phone app altogether and just use it on the computer. Also it tends to get really laggy when I try to use the multitasking functions & heats up my phone really fast.

Love the app but it's so frustrating that I don't receive a single notification when an artist goes live, why? I receive the notif on my digital tablet but not my phone, please fix this it is becoming an annoying problem.

title: IROKOtv
description:
Access the world's best Nollywood movies & TV series: Thousands of Nigerian & Ghanaian films. Watch your favorite movies and TV shows offline. Keep movies on your device and watch them anytime without using additional data!

How does it work? It's easy:

• Tap the INSTALL button to get the app!
• Login or sign up with your phone number. You can also link your existing irokotv.com account.
• Browse through our extensive library and find the movie you want.
• Subscribe and watch as many movies as you want.

Need help? Contact our customer service team anytime at support@irokotv.com or WhatsApp us on +234 817 892 4632. (If you give us a missed call, we'll call you right back).

By using the irokotv app you agree to our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

title: DC Universe - Android TV
description:
DC Universe is a first-of-its kind digital subscription service that gives fans access to exclusive content and experiences not available anywhere else. 

WATCH exclusive original series, epic animated movies, and classic films and TV series. Stream our critically-acclaimed original programs like Harley Quinn, Titans, Young Justice: Outsiders, Doom Patrol, and Swamp Thing -- and look forward to our newest series, Stargirl.  

READ from a library of over 22,000 DC comics with our state-of-the-art digital comic reader. Follow your favorite heroes like Wonder Woman, Superman, Batman, and Aquaman through storylines like Flashpoint and Dark Knights: Metal. You can even download and read your favorites offline.

SHOP from a selection of DC collectibles and merchandise only available to DC Universe members. Get your hands on our exclusive Justice League Animated action figures and exclusive DC apparel.

CONNECT with other members and discuss your favorite DC comics, rivalries, theories, and memories in our moderated forums.

EXPLORE the epic DC Encyclopedia and learn the bios and origin stories of all your favorite DC heroes, what their alliances have been, and their appearances in movies and TV shows through the years. Read the latest news about the DC Universe and learn about new shows and comics, in interviews, features, and other exclusive articles.

WIN - members get chances to win sweepstakes and giveaways , including exclusive event access, movie tickets, stacks of comics, jaw-dropping collectibles, and MORE!
 
Your monthly or annual subscription begins after your free trial. To avoid recurring charges for your subscription fee (which may include local tax depending on your location), you must cancel before the end of your free trial or current billing period.  

By downloading the app, you agree to the DC Universe Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

recentChanges: Our February update is code named Nightwing, a former Boy Wonder who got tired of playing sidekick to one of the most recognizable heroes in the DCU and decided to break out on his own.  Dick Grayson has always stayed true to what he learned as Robin and his code is simple – if you're breaking the law on his turf, expect a swift, painful trip to Arkham.  While everyone's favorite Titan keeps the peace, we continue to improve DC Universe with new features, bug fixes and better performance.
comments: The content is good however the interface could use some work.  There is only one size for the closed captions and it is way too large for me.  Please allow users to change the size of the captions.  Also, when looking at the episodes for a season there is no indication which ones I've already watched.  Take a look at the Netflix GUI. This is probably the best one in terms of Android TV streaming apps.
Great content but it stopped keeping track of last episodes watched. Very annoying. On nvidia shield.
Cool app but no surround sound keeps this from being a good streaming service.

title: LINE LIVE: Broadcast your life
description:
Make the most of your active life with LINE LIVE. Effortlessly create your own live streams and share your daily adventures wherever they happen to take you. 
Not only can you keep up on the most popular influencers, you can also discover talented individuals just like you who broadcast exciting content every day.

1.	A place to reveal your talent to the world!
With LINE LIVE in the palm of your hands, you can turn any occasion into a live event starring you. Showcase your talents and share important moments with a vast but personal audience. Find your fans and discover the rewards that await you. 

2. Express your creativity with cool stickers and filters
You don't need professional make up artists or perfect background sets to make a quality stream. Our collection of quality stickers and filters provide that extra bit of charm or cuteness when you need it. Find the right look to make your stream even better.

3. Boost your popularity as you reach higher levels!
As you gain more and more fans and followers, you can level up to provide even greater visibility for your streams. Leveling up provides better rewards and helps grow your fame. High level streamers might find themselves selected as official LINE LIVE celebrities. You can even turn rewards earned while streaming into actual cash!

4. Find LIVE streams of celebrities and other topics that appeal to your personal taste! 
 Connect with famous people or enjoy a variety of unique streams from regular users. Keep up on your favorite live streams or find new, popular streamers by checking the rankings.

5. Get connected with streamers by chatting and sending gifts!
You don't just watch steams in LINE LIVE. You can chat with streamers in real time and can even send gifts using a variety of animated icons. LINE LIVE is not a one-way broadcasting service. It is a place where viewers can freely interact with streamers and get to know one another. 

We're planning to add even more features to LINE LIVE for your enjoyment. We hope you enjoy using LINE LIVE!

title: Smithsonian Channel
description:
Award-winning programming exclusively from Smithsonian Channel, available anywhere, anytime, and on your favorite devices. Stream original series and entertaining documentaries inspired by the Smithsonian Institution’s museums, research facilities, and publications, and explore worlds of history, mystery, science, pop culture, and more. No commitment or cable subscription required. Just download and enjoy at home or on-the-go.

Upgrade to Smithsonian Channel Plus for an ad-free experience. Unlock even more nonfiction entertainment, like full seasons of our most popular series Aerial America, America in Color, and Air Disasters, in addition to nature and wildlife programs from Smithsonian Earth. With new content added weekly, you'll never run out of genres to explore, worlds to discover, and things to learn! All for just $4.99/month after your FREE 7-day trial*.

Smithsonian Channel Features: 
-- Free award-winning programming exclusively from Smithsonian Channel
-- Select full episodes and clips of your favorite programs plus curated playlists, bonus materials, and original digital shorts
-- Entertaining and educational programs
-- Factual, informative, and trusted
-- Search by your favorite genres

Smithsonian Channel Plus Features:
-- Unlimited streaming of high-quality original documentaries and series
-- Deep library of nonfiction entertainment
-- Full seasons of award-winning series 
-- 300+ hours of 4K UHD programming included in your subscription
-- Ability to curate your own playlist by adding programs to My List for future viewing 
-- Content refreshed weekly

*You will not be charged for the SMITHSONIAN CHANNEL PLUS streaming service during the free trial period (the first 7 days of your subscription). TO CANCEL YOUR SUBSCRIPTION AND AVOID BEING CHARGED, YOU MUST CANCEL BEFORE THE END OF THE FREE TRIAL PERIOD. To keep your subscription once your trial period is over, you will not have to do anything. Free trial is available to new customers only.

Privacy Policy: https://smithsonianchannel.com/privacy-policy
Terms of Use: https://smithsonianchannel.com/terms-of-use
California Privacy/Info We Collect:  https://watch.smithsonianchannel.com/legal/privacy-policy#california
California Do Not Sell My Info: https://ca.privacy.cbs/donotsell

©2018 SN Digital LLC All rights reserved. Smithsonian Channel is a trademark of Smithsonian Institution. SN Digital LLC is an authorized user. Smithsonian Channel PLUS is accessible for viewing solely in the United States and its territories and possessions. Minimum high-speed broadband connection is required for viewing.

comments: Love this app just like many of their books, Informative and entertaining. I was particularly attracted to this app by Aerial America. There is something about that helicopter aerial view that has always fascinated me and even more now. With the advancement of technology I'm really excited about the future of something similar to this using drones. Can't wait!

Will Not Play Video on Chromebook, when you click on the program you want to watch the audio begins to play and the video never comes on. I never had this problem with my phones but it just won't work with the Chromebook. Also, new content is PAINFULLY slow to arrive. I had access to far more programs On Demand when I had Hulu w/ Live TV- as a standalone streaming service it has about half of these shows, and that's just not enough to justify subscribing for another month..

I wish you guys had an app that had articles and some more free things to view. I don't need this for 4.99 a month because every time I go to Barnes and noble I walk out with about 6 Smithsonian books. I feel I have enough already and have supported Smithsonian enough with all my books. Too bad this app is like those awful cable apps.

title: Kito - Chat with fun, Free group chat
description:
Kito live is a popular multi-language live group voice chat and online entertainment community. Connect with people around the world, chat and have fun together!

FEATURES:

Free Group Voice Chat & Private Chat Room
Start high-quality voice chat with up-to 8 persons simultaneously at anytime you like, no matter they are next to you or far away; moreover, you can also start a PIN locked room to enjoy private, peaceful moment.

Unique & Mutli-Type Sub-Room
For professional and senior users, first time ever, creating and managing more rooms is never easier; instead of registering new accounts, by click of a button, you can create sub-rooms with different topics to contain various audience groups. All-in-one under your primary ID!

Selective & Amazing Virtual Gifts
In our opinion, it’s not the gift that appears to be, but the emotion, love, status that is borne; so as to facilitate your choice making, for each and every scenario, we have selected the rightful gifts to express yourself properly. You will be WOW!

Voice Magic
Everyone is a magician! Switch on voice magic, choose the scene, then your whole room will be sound like in it.

Native Online Entertainment
With all friends seating together, it can be more entertaining than just talk. You will always find a native play inspired by local community users and enjoy. 

In-room Games
Play games with your friends in the group chat room. 

Follow us to get the latest news, updates and events:

Instagram: https://instagram.com/kitoliveofficial/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/live_kito

title: Quidd: Digital Collectibles
description:
Remember trading cards? They’re back, in digital form.

Build the ultimate collection by choosing the right mystery packs from hundreds of your favorite brands, shows, anime, movies, comic books, and games! 

Join millions of fans who are chasing limited-edition digital stickers, digital trading cards, and digital 3D figures! 

Be the first to own rare items and level up to become the ultimate fan with the most valuable collection!

Here’s how you do it:

-> Find brands you love, like Disney®, Rick & Morty, Game of Thrones, MARVEL, Transformers™, My Little Pony™, Naruto: Shippuden, and more
-> Open mystery packs and discover what’s inside
-> Keep what you love and sell the rest for coins
-> Level up as your Collection Value grows
-> Become one of the best collectors in the world

With new sets dropping every day and over 2.1 BILLION individual items in circulation, you’re sure to find something you love — and something valuable — for your collection. 

You can also share the stickers that you collect with your friends on different messengers like Whatsapp Messenger, Facebook Messenger, Snapchat and others! We’ll never track your keystrokes.

Are you ready to become the best collector? Join the Quidd community now!

title: iQIYI Video – Dramas & Movies
description:
Get the streaming service with multilingual support for FREE. Watch the MOST POPULAR asian dramas, shows and movies like My Mowgli Boy, Ten Years Late, L.O.R.D Critical World, More Than Forever, When We Are Together, Arsenal Military Academy, The Rap of China 2019, Green Snake, etc., within just ONE app. Thousands of exclusive originals, Korean and local titles are on their way. 

Sign up and get everything - premium contents & features!

Features of iQIYI
• “Freemium” model - offering both complementary and extra-cost services. It’s all up to you.
• Vast streaming library - access to unlimited movies, dramas, and shows. A growing selection of exclusive & global titles are added frequently.
• Multilingual support - multiple language user interface, subtitles & searching tool are available, including but not limited to Mandarin, English, Indonesian, Malay, Thai, and Vietnamese.
• User-friendly interface - simple and clean interface helps find everything you REALLY want.
• Awesome HD experience - Full HD quality guarantees your premium experience. Adaptive bitstream and multiple definition options help save your data while watching smoothly.  
• Free download - to watch anywhere & anytime.
• Viewing history - to pick up where you left off.
• VIP Privileges - watch the most popular content exclusively/in advance without ads.

Your feedback will be highly valuated. Feel free to leave your comments below. Have any questions? Don’t hesitate to contact us via contactus@qiyi.com.

title: HISTORY Vault
description:
Unlock HISTORY Vault to explore the greatest stories in history including ancient civilizations, the World Wars, space exploration and everything in between.

Start your 7-day free trial and then pay only $4.99 per month or $49.99 a year to watch commercial-free, full-length videos with no TV provider needed, through automatic renewals.

New videos are added weekly. Topics range from ancient civilizations to the World Wars to space exploration…and everything in between. Here’s a peek at some of the featured Collections available in HISTORY Vault:

•	WWII: The World in Crisis
•	Secrets of the Dark Ages
•	Inside the Presidency
•	American Civil War: Brother vs. Brother
•	Legendary Leaders

Note: HISTORY Vault content is only available to stream in the United States. Free Trial is only valid for first-time subscribers. Video can only be streamed in the U.S. and U.S. Territories.

Payment is charged to the Google Play account at confirmation of purchase. Your account will be charged for renewal at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can manage your subscription and auto-renewal by visiting Account Settings on your device. If you turn off auto-renew during the current subscription period, your subscription will be canceled for the subsequent period. 

Please contact hvault_support@aenetworks.com if you are experiencing any issues. 

Terms of Use: http://www.aenetworks.com/terms

Privacy Policy: http://www.aenetworks.com/privacy

app closes Everytime I click collections when I use my laptop to try and watch something.
Working great ,love the app lots of history and shows.

Awesome content but it needs a continuous watching feature. I love almost everything they have in the "vault" so I have been bouncing around watching all my favorite shows. But when you go back to one show or the other you can't tell what the last episode you watched was unless you can remember the title of the episode, it's always on the first episode. A handful of instances when it freezes. Had to back out of the episode and then resume and it usually fixes it. Annoying though!

title: StarMaker Lite: No.1 Sing & Music app
description:
Discover everything musical!

Want more friends and music lovers? With trusted by more than 50M users, StarMaker is the No.1 popular karaoke community. StarMaker offers the biggest global songbook, you can find Ed Sheeran, Shawn Mendes or your local tunes. You can either freestyle or collab with other users by exclusive camera flitters and voice editor. New feature ‘take the mic’ offers you an open stage that you can compete to sing the provided lyrics card, challenging the speed of getting the mic with 5 other StarMaker users. It’s a talent show to see who is the awesome king of live singing. Let’s enjoy the world’s beats!


StarMaker Lite Karaoke New Functions!
We have added a bunch of new features for a better singing experience! Such as:

+Daily Task
Newly add Daily Task category, with exclusive VIP check-in and other hidden gems. Go and find out!
+Take The Mic
Optimize Take The Mic experiences, add quick comment feature, mention on the personal card and ranking award. 
+Sing Feature
Sing page provide personalized songbook based on your favorites
+Externalized SID
Check out your unique SID on ME page, use it to search and add friends
+Message
New layout of direct message box, find out what are your friends up to!


To be Social! Sing to gain more friends!
Welcome to our massive and socializing community of a great singing app, make friends from all around the world when you sing karaoke songs, love the voice of every potential future stars. Sing or participate in regular karaoke competitions for chances to win amazing prizes or just have fun with a free karaoke-singing app in your pocket!

Thousands of Songs to sing!
Pick from all the top hits; Updated every day! Includes:

+ 7 Years - Lukas Graham
+ Treat You Better - Shawn Mendes
+ Hotline Bling – Drake
+ Shake It Off – Taylor Swift
+ Love Yourself - Justin Bieber
+ Thinking Out Loud - Ed Sheeran

comments: The update was really horrible.. The older version was so good actually.after singing a song we can't listen whenever we wanted to point it..can't adjust here and there and listen like the previous version. It's like u post it or delete it..the drafts also., we can listen once nd then either post it or delete it. Plz Starmaker team. Fix it.. I'm a huge fan of this app.. Actually brought many users fr this app

New Update is bad(UI). Now we can't select specific time from which we want to hear recording. Not after you finish song not even after saving it in drafts. Please bring it back. It becomes harder to choose right effect, it requires listening particular line over and over again and it's not possible now.

Why is the new update very bad. The system settings like volume, effects, sound speed are not getting fixed..We cannot scroll the song backward or forward to listen a line again while adjusting..After posting songs which were pre adjusted for effect, volume, song speed etc, all the settings gets changed and song is heard with different way...why is all these happening.... This began after the latest updation was done... Need a real solution ASAP..please...

Another bad update from starmaker team. I don't know how people think there when designing and tweaking the UI again and again. 1.Its tough to find who is your collab partner, 2.After recording a song you just can't skip or pause the recorded track 3.Room singing sync problem after the update Hoping for a quick fix..
This is very nice app, I enjoyed it more. And I like to sing here. But sometimes, when i upload my song, there is not getting any sound of my voice, getting only music.

title: UNICORN Color by Number | Pixel Art Coloring Games
description:
UNICORN - pixel color by number  🎨 is a stylish pixel art that will bring you to the world of intriguing coloring. You will find fascinating drawing games inside the app. Color by numbers Unicorn is perfect for adults. Color pixel art Unicorn is an app for anyone who loves to create, to color and just have fun and enjoy the pixel drawing.

  🎨 Antistress pixel coloring app  

You will find more than  400+ original pixel art images  from top graphic designers inside the colorbook. The high-quality coloring pictures is an effective anti-stress therapy. Properly crafted coloring art book helps to get rid of tension after a hard day, to get away from the routine, and, in general, color by numbers will be useful for adults as a modern way of art therapy!

 🦄 Color by number with Unicorn pixel book 

Discover the new world of bizarre illustrations, amazing pixel animals and birds, flowers and fairy-tale characters, as well as many other creatures. You will also find cool pixel geometric and abstract patterns inside the coloring book. Drawing by numbers has never been so fascinating. 

Explore colorful pixel art collections together with friends and family members: Animals, Nature, Cartoons, Dinos, Cars, Fashion, etc. The special color palette suggests what color is what number. Simply follow the numbers in squares and color pixels.

 Coloring book for adults 

The Unicornio coloring reached the world popularity and editor’s love because of modern and fascinating pixel art inside. Our application fulfills your rest with love and art , helps to relieve from stress. 

 Just put your feet up, relax and enjoy the Unicorn! 


 🔖 Advantages of Pixel Art Unicorn 

This is an incredibly useful, functional and beautiful product. And it’s so fun and so easy to color. You don’t even need to be good at pixel art! Moreover, calm coloring has stress relief and tranquilizing effect, reduces anxiety and helps to achieve mindfulness💆.

 What UNICORN applications can do: 

 400+ pixel images for everybody 
 10+ thematic categories (Space, Music, Monsters, Mandalas, etc.) 
 The ability to share results with friends on Facebook and Instagram 
 Bright palette of shades in each drawing 
 Anti Stress pixel art therapy 
 One of the best unicorn games 

Unicorn is a new way of coloring by number. Pixel by pixel, you create modern digital arts. Trendy colors, modern design, cute in-app features. This is Unicorn🦄.

comments: I always wanted to change a mobile phone ringtone, but my friend on the Apple system said that it can only be changed on a computer, and then recommended me a mobile phone software. The complexity is not particularly complicated. It can be done in the picture tutorial, and added their QQ customer service. . I feel okay. I also helped me record my favorite songs. I do n’t know why I did n’t record the sound. Hahaha, thank you. After that, I changed several ringtones myself. It feels great and has a great sense of accomplishment.

It ’s not as easy as holding a bunch of stamps. It ’s really easy to use. It ’s very helpful. The customer service is great all day and very late. I ’m very patient and teaches me step by step. I can learn how to use it. I can also pass on my favorite music. Download it. The benefits for Apple users can be done without a computer! !! !! One hundred faint! !! !!

Ok who is wasting their time paying 85 dollars a week for some stupid wallpaper... Go to Zedge. Most of their wallpapers are free and they are all good. Plus, the ones that aren't free are all a dollar... 3 day trial for a wallpaper??? What a joke. Like seriously, thats a knee slapper... Every five star review was a bribe.

This software is good. It uses the library band that comes with Apple. The steps are very clear, relatively simple, and well received. It is equivalent to using this app to directly generate songs / videos in the format Apple wants (should be Right) Then add it to the library band and share it to my mobile ringtone, you can find it in the settings sound

DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP Absolutely a waste of time to download. Not only is there a "3 day free trial" to access the app but it charges you over $100/week to keep access. Wallpapers are just terrible. Seems like just some people trying to scam money off anyone they can.

comments: It's actually a pretty solid app. It does some odd things, for instance when you start watching something from the Series page of that show it will automatically go to the next episode like Netflix and hulu. When you play from the resume watching section it instead goes to the next thing on the resume watching list instead of the next episode. I don't think that makes a lot of sense

Since the started using Vimeo for videos the app is absymal. It randomly stops playing or if you pause or seek through a video it crashs and begins the video again, cadting is dreadfull it very rarely works, episdoes to not play in order, it take about 10-15 minutes to get it to load,play and cast a video and even then it might not even play. Vimeo destroyed this. Cant believe the content is so good and they cant spare a little cash on a decent app to showcase it all. Very disappointed.

I love the content but the app needs some love and care. It logs me off out of nowhere, doesn't keep track of which videos I've watched and where I stopped correctly. I watch it through casting to my Chromecast so it may be related but still, I wish it'd work better.

If i pause the video for about 10 to 15 minutes and then play it, the video will still pause yet the sound is playing. And if i stop it, it will be error to play all videos. I need to restart not only the apps, but my phone in order to make it work again. Thats the reason i stop my previous subscribsion.

The content is awesome but the app is a bit clunky. The Continue Watching doesn't work well, and videos that I've finished watching, sit there on the list and won't go away. The video player needs some work but it's not awful.
